K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-0: @1b #// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag par gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang @2a #//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-2: mi dang 'byung po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-3: sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-4: dkyil 'khor las can thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-5: sems dpa' chen po smros shig smros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-6: sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-7: phun tshogs thams cad mngon par 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-8: sgrub po rnams la phan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-9: don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par smros; ;ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:1b-10: lus can bar mar gyur pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-0: khyod kyi @2b tshig gi mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-2: myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-3: sems can gang du rab zhugs pa; ;de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-4: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-5: sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-6: thams cad de la rjes yi rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-8: dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-9: sems can rnams kyi mgon pos smros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-10: sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-11: sems can cho ga yang dag 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-13: rab tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-14: dpal min 'joms shing zhi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-15: de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-16: dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-17: gzi brjid stobs ni rnam par 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:2b-18: mthong ngam thos nas de nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-0: @3a *// rab tu dad pa skyed par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-1: gang yin de rnams bdag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-3: thob pa'i ched du'ang lung bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-5: 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-6: rjes su yi rang 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-8: de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-9: sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-10: sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-11: yang dag bka' yis smros shig smros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-12: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-0: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das @3b sh'akya thub pa la tha mi dad pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-1: sh'akya'i rgyal po lha yi rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-2: phun tshogs yon tan du ma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-3: rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul rab ma nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-4: rgyun tu dkar ba'i gos dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-5: mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-6: blo bzang snying po brtan pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-7: gang phyir khyod ni phun tshogs nyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-9: dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-10: mgon po lha rnams kyi ni ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-11: rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-12: de yi tshig ni rab rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-13: dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-15: de de bzhin du de yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-16: lha yi mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-17: brgyad kyis 'di ni dbang zhal las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-18: skyes pa'i dpa' bor rab stobs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-19: g-yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-20: kun nas gser gyi ri dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-21: cod pa na yang ni lhan cig gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-22: lha dang lha min lhar bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-23: lhag pa'i theg pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-24: 'jig rten par do'i srid pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-25: skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-26: byung ba mdzes ldan rang nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-27: 'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-28: gang rnams zla ba lta bur dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-29: lha rnams kyis bzung ri bong can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-30: kunda du ku dkar po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-31: gos ni mnabs nyid tsa ko ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:3b-32: brgya byin 'dab brgya pa yi mig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-0: sa srungs phrag par phyogs gcig @4a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-1: 'gro ;bla ma'i ri la ri bong can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-2: rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-3: mig brgya brtson 'grus ma nyams pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-4: grangs dang chu gter chu 'byin pa; ;tshogs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-5: dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-6: nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-7: rnam pas bras dang dri 'khor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-8: bum dkar gang ba so so yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-9: bum pa de rnams dbang bskur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-10: tsandan sa mchog yan lag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-11: gi wang thig le rnam par bkra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-12: yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-13: dga' ba mchog gi yan lag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-14: lus med gzhom pa'i ched du byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-15: yan lag chags pa byas mtha' las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-16: khrus ni stug pos mi 'pho bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-17: gzhan du 'chi med legs pa ni; ;de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-18: dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-20: char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-21: sngon las khyod ni lam gyi mgo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-22: dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-23: me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-24: rnam par cher phyin longs spyod ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-25: bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-26: bcos nas sngar med cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-27: bcu par khyod ni zhi ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-28: mgon med 'gro ba mtha' yas las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-29: gang phyir srid pa mtha' med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4a-30: dri mas lha dang lha min yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-0: de yi brtul @4b zhugs phan tshun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-1: dam pa'i spyan gyi 'od kyis snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-2: 'khyil ba can yangs yan lag mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-3: phyogs su lha rnams gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-4: mi rnams byang chub rnam sangs rgyas rab tu byed 'gyur zhes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-5: mi rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-6: de phyir rnams pad chu skyes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-7: lha yi yan lag dam por son //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-8: dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags bral; ;'chi bzhin sa yi lus kyang 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-9: kun nas gtod dang kun nas sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-10: yang dag sa dang phyogs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-11: rnam bzhi mnyam par byang chub ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-12: byang chub shing drung bdud dpung las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-13: rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-15: klu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-16: zhe sdang rtsub po'i nags rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-17: rkang pa sdong bu me yi ched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-18: rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-19: khro bo'i me ni 'bar ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-20: mi g-yo rab tu sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-21: phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-22: gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs brnyan brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-23: dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-24: 'jigs pa'i nyi ltar rnam mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:4b-25: yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de byang chub sems dpa' chen @5a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-1: po'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-2: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sems dpa' chen po'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste 'od zer de rnams kyis gang+g'a'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-3: dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-4: yud tsam de la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-5: gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams su bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-8: sems dpa' chen po chen po smros shig; mthu chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-9: sems can sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-10: gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-11: nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5a-14: phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @5b sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags bshad par brtsams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-1: dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig mthong bas slob dpon dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob cing dad pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-2: sems can rnams kyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-3: stobs ma yin pa shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-4: ser sna med cing g-yo sgyu med pas nag po med cing ha cang mi sbom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-5: ha cang mi phra ba; dri ngan pa med pas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-7: snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-14: yang dag par ldan par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-15: sems can gyi dgongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-19: dge 'dun la mngon par dang pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-20: cha mang po mngon par shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-21: gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-22: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la byang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-23: rig gsum gang yang rung ba'i rig pa pa sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-26: mchod rten gyi las byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:5b-27: ha cang mi rgan byis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-1: par skyes pa ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-2: gzhon zhing lang tsho dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-3: tshul bzang po'i sgrub pa pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-5: de nas 'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-6: nus med 'dul nyes ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-7: dkyil 'khor yang dag rab sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-8: rmongs pa'i sems dang chags can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-9: dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-10: gang zhig bslab la yud tsam yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-11: lhag par 'gro ba'i lus can des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-12: mtho ris thar pa yang dag 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-13: yid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-14: byang chub sems ni rjes zhig pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-15: dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-16: byang chub rtsa bar rig thob pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-17: sems de las ni yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-18: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-19: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-20: rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-21: bdag nyid kho nar rab rtogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-22: de la bstan bya'i dkyil 'khor bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-23: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-24: stobs kyis sngon 'dul si tha'i lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-25: cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-26: grong dang grong khyer grong rdal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-27: ljongs rnams su ni byang shar gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-28: phyogs kyi cha ru mchod yon byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6a-29: sa yi mthil du de ji ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-0: sa phyogs sngags la sngags @6b 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-1: snum zhing ljon shing me tog bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-2: 'bras bu yang dag mang po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-4: dkar dang ser ba'i sa gzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-5: gyo mo bong ba gseg ma bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-6: rnga bo che yi sgra dbyangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-7: lam gyi bzhi mdo dur khrod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-8: lha gzhan yongs su bzung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-9: shes shing sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-10: gang du kun nas rgyang grags lnga'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-11: tshad du chu klung lteng ka dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-12: mtsho phran chu bo rab 'bab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-13: ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-14: me tog nyid ni dus rgyun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-15: shin tu rgya chen yang dag ldan; ;cho 'phrul phyogs ni gang rung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-17: dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-18: nyi ma gung la song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-19: ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yi; ;mngon par mdzes pa'i las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-20: thog mar rab dag sems can kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-21: byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-22: dkyil 'khor gnas der yid kyis dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-23: dge ba'i rig pa gdon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-24: sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-25: de bzhin dbyangs ni rjes su gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-26: 'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-27: dkyil 'khor lus can kun gyis bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-28: phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i gnas su gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-29: thog mar gtor ma byin byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-30: dri yi yam shing yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:6b-31: gnas su gnas pas kun zos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-2: dbyangs kyis tshig 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-3: slob dpon ming ni che ge bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-4: bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-6: bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-7: bdag mthar gdug pa'i sems med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-8: bskyed cing bkur stir byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-9: sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-10: sems can rnams la phyir zhing ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-11: mang du rab tu dad pa'i ched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-13: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-14: de nas sems can de rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-16: mtshan mo mthong ba sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-17: de nas bris pa'am gzhan du song //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-18: tho rangs rmi lam rnam par spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-19: sa yi phyogs der song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-20: khru brgya yi ni tshad du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-21: kun nas gru bzhi pa ru bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-22: phyi rol dpag tu med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-23: dkon mchog gsum gyi tshad song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-24: s'a la shing dang phub ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-25: thal ba sol ba so phag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-26: skra dang sen mo mchod sbyin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-27: so phag nag po la sogs gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-28: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dge ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-29: mi dge'i zug rngu thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-30: lhag ma med par bsal nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-31: sa yi gong bu de nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7a-32: gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-0: 'gram @7b gnyis sa ni sbyang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-1: rab tu bcug ste tho bas brdung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-2: tsandan chu yis yang dag gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-3: de ltar byas nas ma ltung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-4: ba byung tsandan chu bsres nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-5: khru brgyad pa yi phyogs su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-6: phyi rol gyis kyang khru bcu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-7: ched du yongs su spyangs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-8: gso sbyong byin nas byug tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-9: ji srid sa yi phyogs der ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-10: shin tu 'jam zhing shin tu ni; ;legs par rdzogs par skyes kyi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-11: de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-12: de nas khru bzhi'i tshad du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-13: grva bzhi seng ldeng phur bu brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-14: sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-15: gzhon nu mas bkal srad bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-16: tshon sna lnga pa legs 'jam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-17: shin tu sra ba bcom ldan ma'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-18: rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-19: bsngags pas phur bu la dkris nas; ;bdun byas srod la gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-20: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-21: gtsang ma'i gos ni bgos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-22: dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus de ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-23: rtsa ba nag po med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-24: bum blang dri yi chu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-25: me tog sgron mas bkang ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-26: mgrin par me tog phreng bar dkris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-27: aa mra'i yal 'dab kha dgab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-28: pus mo dag ni nges btsugs nas; ;rtsa ba'i rig pa bdun byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-29: yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-30: de nas phyogs bcur kun bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:7b-31: 'di ni bsgrag bya che ge dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-2: sems can kun gyi ting 'dzin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-4: sangs rgyas phan par mdzad pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-5: dkyil 'khor du ni byon par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-6: da lta 'dir ni byon nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-7: bdag gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-8: de dbus nyid du brtag bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-9: gnas su bris pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-10: spyan drang bya zhing lha rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-11: gnas mdor bstan nas brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-12: dga' ldan du ni byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-13: 'jig rten gzhan du gang gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-14: de bzhin kha ba'i gnas su dang; ;gang ldan padma'i dbang phyug 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-15: lcang lo can du nor dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-16: ti se ru ni bde byed bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-17: mchod yon snod ni bkang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-18: de rnams gnas ni rnam bsams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-19: de nas zhal ni srub bsnyen bkur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-20: dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-21: ming dang gnas ni yongs nyams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-22: phyin ci log tu ldog par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-23: de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-24: nyin re nyin re tsandan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-25: chu yis byug tu gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-26: mtshan mo'i thun la'ang de bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-27: phar 'dir yo byad thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-29: de la 'di ni brjod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-30: dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-31: phye ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8a-32: dzi pa'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-0: @8b phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-2: phye ma mtha' dag gis gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-3: gur gum chu dang mtshungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-5: zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-6: de bzhin ma ra ka tas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-7: de tsam kha dog rin chen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-8: lcags kyang rung ste ming can lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-9: yang na dris btags phye mas sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-10: ji ltar snyed pa rnams sprul pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-11: rab bkug rin chen phye ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-12: yang dag pa yis dngos grub 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-13: nor bu mching bu mtshungs min gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-14: padma r'a gas rnam pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-15: dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-16: slob dpon gyis ni gzhon nu ma'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-17: lag pas byed du gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-18: bram ze rgyal rigs rigs skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-19: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang; ;ma nor skyes pa rab mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-20: dbang po ma tshang ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-21: mdor na bud med mtshan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-22: yang dag ldan par skyes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-24: gsum la gso sbyong sbyin nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-25: 'o ma'i zas kyis mngon dga' bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-26: byas nas dkar po'i go bgos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-27: dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-28: byed bzhug dkyil 'khor yo byad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-29: legs bsags so sor brtags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-30: chu dang rnam par dben pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:8b-31: dge slong 'dul ba byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-2: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa sngon 'gro bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-3: slob dpon rang gi lhag gnas ched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-4: phye ma thams cad bdug pa dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-5: gtor ma dang ni mar rnams ni; ;cho ga can gyis byed du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-6: de nas slob dpon yo byad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-7: tshogs nas dkyil 'khor rang nyid bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-8: slob ma yongs su gzung bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-9: de rnams sangs rgyas chos dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-10: dge slong dge 'dun la rab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-11: yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-12: bden par smra dang sbom pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-13: mdzes pa mthong dang kha dog gtsigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-14: gzung bar mi bya gcig gnyis gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-15: bco brgyad dang ni gzhan bcu drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-16: de rnams skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-17: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-18: 'o ma'i ston mo bza' ba dang; ;'o ma'i shing las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-19: so shing sor mo brgyad kyi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-20: bcom ldan rtsa ba'i snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-21: lan ni nyi shu rtsa bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-22: mngon par sngags nas ba yi gcin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-23: rab sbyar mtshan mo'i thun mtshams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-24: dkyil 'khor sa gzhi phyi rol du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-25: shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-26: khres la rim pas nyer 'dug nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-27: snying bo re re lag par byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-28: rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-29: gtsug tor bcing la'ang bdun bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-30: de nas so shing de rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9a-31: byin nas rang rang so shing bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-0: @9b ral gcig ma yi snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-1: lan bdun sngags pa'i dri yi chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-2: spyi bor mngon par gtor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-3: de nas de rnams la brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-4: bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-5: dbang phyug mchog gi thugs rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-6: chen po'i mchog ni sbyin pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-7: bsgral dka' sgrol ba dran par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-8: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-9: rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-11: bskyed par byed ma dran par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-12: de yi 'og tu slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-13: slob ma de rnams kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-14: 'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos; ;brtan par byas nas de rnams mdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin bklag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-16: de lta bu yi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-17: bud med rnams kyang yongs bzung bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-18: langs nas bu mos bkal ba yis; ;srad bu tshon sna lnga pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-19: mi mnyam rgyud du bsgrim pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-20: dri yi chu yis mngon bkrus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-21: re rer padma'i bgrang phreng gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-22: bsang gtor byas nas rtsa ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-23: snying po lan grangs nyer gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-24: mngon sngags de la 'dir brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-25: dpal gyi gzhi ni yod pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs mtshan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-27: byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba ste; ;padma'i bgrang phreng de phyir sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-28: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-29: slob ma rnams la cha phra mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-30: lag pa la ni bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:9b-31: slob ma rnams la gang kho na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-1: nyid slob ma bdag nyid bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-2: de nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-3: shar du mngon phyogs bla gos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-4: phrag pa gcig tu byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-5: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-6: sa la rab tu btsugs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-7: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-8: rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-9: sangs rgyas byang chub thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-10: rang rgyal 'phags pa nyan thos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-11: lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-12: lha mo'i dri dang me tog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-13: phreng ba yongs su 'dzin pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-14: kun la gsol ba gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-16: che ge mo zhes bya ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-17: bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-19: de dag rang nyid byon par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-21: byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-22: nyan thos lha klu gnod sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-23: dri za lha min nam mkha' lding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-25: rang gi rig pa sngags tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-26: yongs bskor sems can thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-27: rjes su brtse bas byon nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-28: bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-29: de ltar yang gnyis yang gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-30: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-31: rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10a-32: dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-0: dbus su me tog phreng ba @10b dor; ;gal te me tog phreng g-yo byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-1: de nas byon par shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-2: de nas sangs rgyas byang sems la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-3: dri yi chu yis mchod yon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-4: me tog phul cig de nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-5: khru brgya'i phyi rol sa gzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-6: yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-7: aa p'a marga'i yam shing gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-8: me ni rab tu sbar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-9: shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-10: rtsa ba'i snying po sbrang rtsi zho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-11: mar gyi sreg blugs brgyad brgyar dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-12: de nas sangs rgyas byang sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-13: lha rnams la yang mchod yon dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru; ;gso sbyong yongs su blangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-15: skyes bu srung ba'i phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-16: dbang po tshang ba bzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-17: de la 'dir ni brjod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-18: gang zhig rnam pa gzhan bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-19: skyong ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-20: dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-22: de phyir cho ga byas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-23: slob mas dam tshig shes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-25: rab gnas slob mas thabs cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-26: song nas ku sha bting ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-27: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-28: tshogs kun rjes su dran pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-29: g-yas pa'i gzhogs kyis nyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-30: de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:10b-31: gtsang ma shar du kha phyogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-2: de la 'di ni brjod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-3: gang zhig tsandana bil ba sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-4: au du ma b'a ra sogs n+ya grodha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-5: rgyal mtshan phreng bas khyab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-6: rmi lam rab tu dad pa'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-7: kha cig me lce mdzes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-8: de ltar mthong ba de dngos grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-9: mchog gi bar du'o ngang pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-10: k'a randa ba krung krung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-11: rma bya ro ha na rnams ni; ;gang zhig de lta bu mthong 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-12: rmi lam bar ma'i dngos grub de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-14: ma 'am ra ha na yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-15: de bzhin pi wang thogs pa dang; ;kunda la sogs pa yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-16: de bzhin aa sogs dhi mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-17: gang yang rmi lam mthong byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-18: mi rnams tha ma'i dngos grub de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-19: sgrol ma'i rtog par nges par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-20: gtum po khyi yi lag pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-21: gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-22: bong bu rnga mo shing rta sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-23: mthong dang reg pa nyid sogs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-24: rgya skyegs til mar gyis reg pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-25: gang gis rmi lam du 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-26: de yi dngos grub nges par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-28: de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-29: rmi lam blo yis rnam dpyad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-30: de ltar rab blo gang shes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-31: slob ma de la rmi lam gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-32: lung du yang ni bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11a-33: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-0: @11b gal te khyim gnas gyur pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-1: dge slong dge slong ma dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-2: dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-3: chen po de rnams gso sbyong ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-4: bzung ste phyi nas slob ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-5: gso sbyong yang dag gus par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-6: slob ma rmi lam mi dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-7: bstan bya sngon du sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-8: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-9: snga ma kho nar sa dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-10: ras ris mthar ni aa l'a ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-11: zangs las 'byung ba rab zhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-12: yang dag 'jog par byed du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-13: de nas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-14: tsandan chu yis legs par byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-15: slob ma thams cad gnas gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-16: snying po bsrung ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-17: dkyil 'khor phyi yi gnas gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-18: nyer 'dug dam tshig shes pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-19: nang du rab tu gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-20: de nas nyi ma nub dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-21: dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-22: bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-23: tshon sna lnga pa rtsa ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-24: snying po lan bdun sngags byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-25: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-26: phur bu de rnams srad bus bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-27: de dag thams cad khru yi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-28: gsum byas srad bus yongs dkri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-29: phyi nas kun tu dung dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-30: rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-31: 'khor rnga rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-32: 'khar ba dang ni pheg rdob rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-33: kun nas 'khrol bar byed du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:11b-34: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-1: rol du ni dgram par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-2: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-3: tshon sna lnga pa'i thig skud kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-4: khru brgyar byas nas thig gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-5: de lam dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-6: de nas kha dog thams cad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-7: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-8: rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgyar bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-9: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-10: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-11: rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-12: nyan thos dge 'dun rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-13: phyag byas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-14: rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas che; ;ral pa gcig pa'i snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-15: gdug pa'i sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-16: sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-17: dkyil 'khor yang ni thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-18: slob dpon gyi ni yo byad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-19: ral gcig snying po nyid kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-20: thog mar bsrung ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-21: byang shar phyogs nas brtsams byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-22: tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-23: rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-24: dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-25: yongs su bcad cing lus dkar ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-26: slob de de bzhin gshegs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-27: phyag rgya rin chen phyems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-28: padma'i rigs la phyag byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-29: phye ma ser pos bcom ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-30: 'phags ma sgrol ma phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12a-31: ljang gu rnams kyis nyan thos kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-0: rang sangs rgyas @12b kun phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-1: nag pos rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-2: de ltar dang pos dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa'i snying por ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-3: phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyi tshad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-4: gsum pa mtho gang ba de'i nyis 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-5: de ltar thams cad du rim gyis bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-7: rang sangs rgyas thams cad der rang byon par mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-9: rin po che thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-11: dri dang; me tog thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-12: tsandan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-13: m'a sha'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkang pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-14: du ku la'i ras dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-17: dkyil 'khor de'i yo byad thams cad ras ris gnyis pa'i mthar me tog gi phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-18: de la 'di brjod par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-19: dam tshig don dang bsod nams don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-20: 'dod don so sor dmigs byed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-21: sdom pa gzung bar byas gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-22: gang du gnas pa thams cad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:12b-24: gzhan gyis mi thub thugs rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-2: 'di rnams ming ni kun drang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-4: 'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-5: de bzhin du ni khro gnyer can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-6: khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-7: 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-8: spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-9: rig pa mchog las slar 'jigs byed; ;rdo rje ser skya rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-10: drag por bzhed dang seng+ge dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-11: de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-12: 'di rnams ming ni kun nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-13: phyag na rdo rje kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-14: de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phye ma dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-15: yungs kar dkar po bsres pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng+ge'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-16: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-18: gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bzhin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang por bris shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhogs gnyis su phye ma ser po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-20: padma ge sar phan tshun bsres pas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13a-21: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-1: rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-2: sa bon gyis gang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-3: 'bras bu phyag na bsnams pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-5: bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-7: kun nas 'bar ba'i gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-10: nor bu'i phung po dang; gser gyi phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-11: rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-14: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-15: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-17: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-19: sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-20: 'jig rten gsum pa'i phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-23: lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g-yas kyi gzhogs su nye bar bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-26: bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-28: rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:13b-35: dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-3: bdud bzhi rnam par 'dul ba'i gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-4: gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-5: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-7: lung bstan pa zhes gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'di rnams g-yon gyi steng du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-8: gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad bri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma spyan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams padma'i gdan la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-18: rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying po zhes pa 'di rnams padma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-23: rab tu dang ba'i sku cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14a-24: rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-0: gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'og tu de @14b bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po khro bo'i gzugs can padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-4: cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la blta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-5: gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-7: bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyi mi thub ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-8: phyi nas dge sbyong ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzes ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-11: de bzhin gshegs ma sems ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams padma'i gdan la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-15: 'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-17: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:14b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-3: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po kun nas 'od padma'i gdan la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-4: phyag na padma ste de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs g-yas pas sa bon gyis gang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-5: phyag g-yon pas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-6: rang gi cha byad kyis kun tu gnas par yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-7: gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad ji ltar rig par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-9: bcom ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-16: brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang sangs rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams padma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-17: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-19: bla gos ser po can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15a-22: mdun gyi 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-0: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs @15b pa padma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa la gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-1: de'i yang nye logs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-3: padma'i gdan la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'i 'og tu padma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-5: padma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-10: thal mo sbyar ba byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-11: cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs la lta bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-12: bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-13: de'i gong du padma chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo mdog dmar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-14: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-15: padma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-16: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-17: khro bo'i rgyal po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'gyur pa'i gzugs 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-20: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus su bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-21: sgrol ma'i g-yon gyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:15b-22: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-5: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi padma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa 'gro ba zhes bya ba bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-7: padma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-9: g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i smad g-yogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-12: 'od zer 'bar ba; bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-13: dri ma med pa 'gro ba'i steng gi g-yon du bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-16: g-yang gzhi nag po can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-17: rab tu dang ba'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-18: de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs byed pa padma'i gdan la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-20: padma'i sdong bus dkris pa'i lus can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-22: g-yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag tu bkod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-24: cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16a-25: phyag na rdo rje'i g-yas kyi snam bu gcig la rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-1: bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-3: legs par grub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-7: rig pa bzang po dang; legs 'grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-15: sngon rabs dang; rin chen ke l'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-22: 'bar ba zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngags kyi rgyal po chen po ste kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-23: rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-25: bzhin cung zad khro gnyer du byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-26: phyag g-yon pas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-27: 'di dag gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-28: 'di lta ste; bcom ldan 'das m'a ma k'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-29: rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-30: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-32: rdo rje rnam par rgyal ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-35: bi shi ni rdo rje spyan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-36: rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-37: rdo rje khu tshur ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-39: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:16b-40: rdo rje sgra ldan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-4: rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-5: rdo rje gnam lcags ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-6: dus kyi rdo rje ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-7: rdo rje gtsug phud ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-8: rdo rje bka' bsgo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-11: rdo rje gzugs ldan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-12: rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams rdo rje'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-14: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-15: cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan par byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-18: dar la'i stod g-yogs mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-20: g-yas pa bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-22: de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-25: dbyibs bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17a-28: 'od dpag med dbus su bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-0: rgyan thams cad kyis @17b rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-1: phyag g-yon pas padma'i phyag rgya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-2: g-yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g-yob par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-3: padma'i gdan la sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byas pa'i lus can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-4: cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-6: padma'i gdan la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-10: stod g-yogs dmar po mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-11: phyag g-yas pas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-12: phyag g-yon pas rnga yab kyis brel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-13: 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i spyan cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-14: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g-yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-15: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-21: stod g-yogs dmar po mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:17b-22: phyag g-yon pas autpa la yongs su bzung nas g-yas pas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-3: ha cang mi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi g-yas su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bco brgyad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-6: bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-9: phyag bcu gnyis pa dang; phyag drug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-16: rta mgrin dang; don yod zhags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-17: 'od zer stong gis rnam par snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-18: mgrin pa dkar pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-19: mtha' yas rnam rgyal dang; rnam rgyal chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-21: mtha' dpag tu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-23: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di rnams padma'i rigs kyi gtso bo srid par 'jug pa nye bar spyod par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-24: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-25: padma'i lus kyis nye bar bskor ba'i lus phyag na padma dang; g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18a-26: cung zad sgrol ma la lta bar gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-0: bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nye logs su gos dkar mo padma'i gdan la nye @18b bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-4: phyag na padma rab tu rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-5: g-yas pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-6: de'ang g-yas su phreng cig la brten pa'i padma'i rigs kyi las kyi gtso mo bcu bzhi bri bar bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-8: bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-14: sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i zla ba ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-18: shes rab gos can ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-23: byang chub kyi yan lag gi yu ma zhes pa 'di rnams rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-24: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-26: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-27: lha'i bud med kyi cha byad 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-29: cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-30: padma bsnams shing g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa; rang gi gzugs su bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:18b-31: sgrol ma'i 'og tu ci bgyi zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po zhal bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-3: nag po mthar byed pa'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-6: zhal gcig gis drag tu bzhad pas gdangs bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-7: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-8: dang pos sgrol ma lta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-9: phyag dang pos rin po che mthong ba 'byin par byed bzhin pa; g-yon dang pos zhags pa bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-10: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-11: de'i 'ang g-yas su khro bo chen po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba lha chen po la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-12: padma'i chu bas dkris pa'i lus can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-14: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-16: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga thams cad sngar brjod pa kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-17: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-18: /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19a-20: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rang gi snying po sbyin par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-0: gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting @19b nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-3: nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-10: dam pa yang dag rab 'chad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-11: dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-12: phyi yi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-13: de yi dbus su srad bu mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-14: gru bzhi yongs su bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-15: gnyis par 'joms pa po song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-16: dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-17: dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-18: ri mo bzhi po rnams kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-21: 'jig rten mgon po dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-23: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-24: de ru slob dpon rab bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-25: padma chen po'i phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-27: mnyam par gzhag pas mnyam par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-28: ji ltar chu la padma gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:19b-29: gnas kyi nyes pa mang pos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-2: 'gro la chags pas yang dag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-3: lan gcig 'di gsungs dper brjod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-4: de nas lcags kyu mchog dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-5: yang dag bkug nas padma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-6: spyan ras gzigs dbang grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-7: de la 'di ni padma'i lcags kyu chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-8: aom mah'a padmo h'um dza hr'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs nas slob dpon la mthong ba sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-10: yang na 'od zer gtong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-11: de nas 'di nyid kyi phyag rgyas slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-12: dar dkar pos gos dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-13: gtsug tor dkar pos mgo bo dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-14: 'di nyid 'jig rten du rab tu brjod nas de nas smros shig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-15: de nas padma lag pa g-yon du byin nas g-yas pas chu snod byin te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-16: sangs rgyas thams cad padma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-19: de nyid lhan cig brtag par bya zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-20: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-21: ting nge 'dzin yang bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i padma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-0: de nas padma'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris nas dbus kyi ze 'bru la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgya bzlas @20b par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa de la kun tu gzigs par byed pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-3: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste de bzhin kho nar dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas dbus su padma stong dgod du gzhug go ;de nas padma stong po de bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya ste lan re lan re yongs su bzlas nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-4: de nas slob ma rab tu bcug nas dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-5: bu dang slob ma'i ched du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-6: dam tshig nyams par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-7: dam tshig bdag la brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-8: gang phyir padma'i rnam pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-10: dam tshig gi ni dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-11: las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-12: mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-14: lus kyis spyan ras gzigs mgon la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-15: dag gis phyag na rdo rje la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-16: las las nam mkha'i snying por skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-17: ji ltar sgrub thabs cho gar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:20b-18: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri rab lhun po'i ri'i rtse mor 'khod pa rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis kun tu gnas pa'i sku thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgyad do zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-0: @21a *// de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun tu bzlas bas ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'phros nas sgrub pa po'i padma'i dbus su 'khod de slar yang de nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzhan 'byung ste sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur ba gnas shing brtan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-2: de nas bdag gi dngos po thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mtshungs pa skad cig de la bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-3: ji srid du 'phur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-4: sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-5: de nas sgrub pa gzhan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-6: las chen po thams cad 'byung ste 'bum bzlas pas las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-7: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad lhag ma med par zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-8: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21a-9: de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni 'bum phrag sum @21b cu rtsa lnga bzlas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-1: de nas phyag rgya chen po ni mchod rten stong phrag brgya byas nas mthar cho gas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-2: de nas tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas snying gar rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-4: de nas zhal du rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-5: de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-6: ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-7: thog mar brjod pas gzhan gyi grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-9: mdzes par spyan drangs pas thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-10: 'bebs pa la tsandan gyi bdug pas gdon 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-11: shi r'ish'a'i me tog gis sems can dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-12: dri bzang po'i me tog gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-13: sa dkar pos bud med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-14: dri zhim po'i me tog gis chom rkun rengs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-15: yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis ri dvags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-17: yungs kar dkar po gtor bas mig 'phrul ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-18: rma bya'i nu mas rmi lam ston par byed do; ;dus gsum du bzlas pas rmi lam ngan pa 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:21b-19: til gyi sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-0: bya gag gi gshog pa'i sbyin @22a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-1: sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-2: rgyal po 'khyil ba'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-3: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas mtshan mo brgyad smyung bar gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-4: de nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-5: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la bud med kyi dbang po'i spu'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-6: bu mo dbang du byed pa la'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-7: don gzhan la'ang sbyin sreg dang bcas pas spyan ras gzigs dbang gi mdun du nyi ma re rer dus gsum du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-8: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-9: chen po thams cad kyi rgyu 'phrul lo ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-10: de nas sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i mnyam par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-11: khru lnga pa dang sgo bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-12: sgo khyud rta babs nges gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-13: phyi rol padma'i rnam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-14: de nas kun nas grva rnams su'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-15: de ni legs par bsams byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-16: nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-17: sngar brjod snying po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-18: zlos bzhin 'di ni bsrung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22a-19: dkar po dmar po ser po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-0: nag po ljang gu'i tshon sna @22b lnga'i; ;phye ma 'jam po rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-1: sgrol ma'i rig pas mngon sngags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-2: bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das ni bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-3: khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-4: g-yon du ral pa gcig ma bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-5: g-yas su 'dam skyes phyi rol gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-6: sgo khyud snying por ji rigs grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-7: yongs su 'dod pas rdo rigs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-8: dri yi phye mas yongs su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-9: rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che; ;gang du 'jig rten gsum cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-12: khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-13: de ni g-yas kyi sgo khang du; ;stobs po che ni rab bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-14: nya yis mgrin par stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-15: nub phyogs su ni bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-16: g-yas kyi phyi yi sgo khang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-17: de bzhin dbang phyug chen po bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-18: de la mdung gi phyag rgya dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-19: ji 'dra'i au ma bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-20: lho yi grva gnyis su bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-21: phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-22: nub dang byang gi grva rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-23: log 'dren phyag rgya rdo rje 'o; ;byang gi grva gnyis rnams su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-24: mkhas pas rigs kyi phyag rgya bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-25: shar gyi grva gcig rnams su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-26: ma mo tshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-27: bhring gi ri ta log 'dren bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-28: de nas ji ltar 'byor pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-29: cho gas ji bzhin lha rnams mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-30: khro bo stobs chen sgrol mas non //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:22b-31: bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-2: blangs nas rang gnas smyung gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-3: mkhas pas byang gi sgo khang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-4: gtsang ma gang du rab 'jug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-5: blo dang ldan pas spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-6: khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-7: ji ltar rig pa'i cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-8: tshar bcad rjes su 'dzin pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-9: gdon dang lus kyi las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-10: de nyid du ni nges par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-11: tshar bcad dam tshig bde ba 'dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-12: gdon 'pho byed dang za byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-13: gang zhig la la gsod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-14: de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-15: sems can rnams ni thams cad nyid; ;sgrub thabs bya dang 'khrul 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-16: ji 'dra ba yi bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-17: mkhas pas las ni stong dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-18: gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-19: rang gi rigs dang gzhan rigs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-20: phyag rgya nye bar mtshon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-22: 'byung po'i tshogs la sogs pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-23: de nas gtor ma bdug pa sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-24: rgyas pas mngon par mchod byar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-25: de yis gdon mthong de mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-26: phyis kyi dbang las dul ba thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-27: skye bos btung ba sbyin sreg la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-28: sogs pa rnam par gzhom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-29: shi sha l'an tsa na blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-30: gdon thob pa ni 'pho bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23a-31: srin po rnams kyis byin pa'i mchu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-0: mthong ba de 'dra'i mtshon rnams @23b dang; ;sha za rnams la ri bong can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-2: 'jigs pa mthong na sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-3: kun tu rnam par lta bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-4: skem byed gdon gyi rnam 'gyur gang; ;nus dang dpung pa brten pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-5: dgra bo rnams ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-6: lha dang mtshon cha'i bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-7: padma byed dang ral pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-8: dbyug gu bgrang phreng 'jigs pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-9: ril ba spyi blugs mi thub nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-10: phyag rgya bram ze can zhes bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-11: rtse gsum kun dang zla phyed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-12: ral pa mig la sogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-13: khyu mchog sgra dang drag po dang; ;dbang ldan rnams te bdun du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-14: shakti gdengs ka ba dan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-15: khyim bya de bzhin rma bya'i mjug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-16: phyag rgya gzhon nu ma can bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-17: 'khor lo dung dang be con nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-18: ral gri phub nyid nam mkha' lding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-19: mgo nyid phyag rgya khyab 'jug bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-20: che ba sprin ni lha chen po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-21: bum pa gtun shing de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-22: ngang pa'ang g-yon gzhogs phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-23: phyag rgya la hi ri kar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-24: nam gru rnams dang gtor zan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-25: rgan po gtum po mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-26: nam gru dkar po rnams kyi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-27: rang gi gzugs nyid mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:23b-28: mdangs 'phrog rnams kyi'o lhung bzed dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-0: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste byed pa @24a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-1: thams cad dge ba la shing gcig gam ni dur khrod gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-2: khang stong gtsang ma tshva sgo med pa'i sa gzhi mthong nas sgrub pa po khros pas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te re kha gsum der bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-3: kun nas khru bzhi pa la dang por thal ba'i re kha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-4: gnyis pa ri'i btsag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-5: gsum pa sol ba'i phye mas rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-6: byang ngam; nub tu'ang sgo gcig byed du gzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-7: sgo'i dbus su'ang lha chen po lag na mdud thogs pa bya'o; ;snam bu'i nang du sangs rgyas bden par rmad du byung ba'i bdag nyid can bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-8: sangs rgyas g-yas kyi gzhogs su sgrol mas non pa rnam par dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-9: g-yon du dpa' mo chen mo stobs mo che ma ral pa gcig ma bzhag nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rgyab tu dgod par bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-11: dpa' bo chen po stobs kyi rgyu'ang dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-15: rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du mngon par brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24a-16: lha de rnams ni 'khor dang bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-0: 'di thams cad nas ma mo'i tshogs rnam par med par bya ste dpal @24b ldan ma ni snam bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-3: bum rnam yang sgo'i spyan pa ra ba yi yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-4: nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams lto 'phye chen po las ma 'das pa yang dag par mchod de stong phrag bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-5: shes rab can sngags kyi rgyal po grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-7: gdon thams cad las 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-8: rtsod pa'ang rnam par 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-10: de nas gsang sngags 'di'ang rtag tu bzlas pa'i gu gul gyi chu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-11: ku shas gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-14: mngon par mdzes pa can nyid spyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu byas par grub ste thams cad 'joms pa sgrol mas non pa gang yin pa don gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:24b-15: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-0: bdag gis mngon par shes pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la mngon sum du thos pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ral pa gyen @25a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-1: brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar sems can gyi don gyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-2: sgrol ma'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-3: thabs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-6: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-7: mah'a pu ru sha ri sha bhe bhya: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra mah'a sth'a ma pr'apta mee tri ya manydzu shr'i badzra p'a ni pra bhri ti bhyo mah'a sa tve bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-8: de rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi snying po 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa srid pa'i lam rnam par 'joms par byed pa brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-13: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-14: pa ra ma me tri tsitta hi ta tsitta k'a ru ni k'a m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-22: ha ri ha ri ha ri b'a hano rbba pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-29: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-31: dza t'a mu ku t'a ba la mu tr'a la ma la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25a-32: ba la ma la ma la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-7: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-8: nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor byas te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-9: me tog la sogs pa mngon par bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-10: de nas nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-11: zla ba drug kho nar byas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
