K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-12: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-13: gal te mtshams med pa byas pas kyang ma grub pa na de'i tshe nga mtshams med pa byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-14: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-17: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyud phyi mar 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:25b-18: sring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par @26a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-9: rkang pas rab tu bgrod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-13: skal pa bzang po nyid rab tu sbyin pa po tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-15: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa las bzlog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-16: rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can gyis lhag pa'i cha khyim du skyes pa kun tu ston par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen pa'i mthu'i don gyis ched stong phrag pas kyang stong phrag brgya po des kyang lan gcig gzhom pa tsam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-19: dpe tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i yul 'jig rten du ma'i 'byung gnas rang bzhin du gnas pa la ltos nas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su sgrub pa 'di rnams gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-21: yid dbang du gyur pa dngos grub rab tu stsol bar mdzad par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-23: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-24: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26a-29: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-0: na ma a'arya aa @26b ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-2: rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-4: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-5: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-7: mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o; ;na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-8: na mo a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-9: aom aa pa ra dzi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-10: gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o zhes pa de lta bu sring mo bzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-12: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-15: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shvar'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-16: aom ki ni ki ni sarba ta th'a ga t'a autbha pa sh'ante /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-18: autta ma ta th'a ga t'a autbha ba h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-19: ming po gtum bu ru zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-20: sngags kyi rgyal po yongs su bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-21: mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-22: phyi ma'i rgyud kyi las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-23: ji lta ji ltar rab sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-24: de lta de ltar sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-25: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rang gi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan par 'dod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-26: stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te rang gi rdo rje yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:26b-27: de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-0: bdag kyang rtog pa'i rgyal po rgyud phyi ma 'dir @27a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-1: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mthu kun tu bstan pa'i don du 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod rten rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa sbyin par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-2: de la rjes su yi rang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe mchog gi grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-3: mchog gi las byed pa tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa pos gang rtul ba las byung ba 'di rnams rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-5: pha rol gnon par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-8: gsungs shig de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-9: phyag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs pa de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27a-10: de nas phyag na rdo rjes phyag gi sor mo rab tu brkyang ste rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-0: rdo rje nag po ste g-yon pa'i phyogs las byung ba 'di rnams bcom @27b ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i spun rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-1: de nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-2: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-3: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu'i spun lnga po rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal te sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-5: dngos grub sbyin par byed pa sgrol ma'i rtog par don chen po sbyin pa phyag na rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba padma'i phyag la mnga' bdag tu gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-6: de nas phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-7: gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-8: ji srid khru ni brgyad kyi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-9: nor 'dod pa yis khru gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-10: bu 'dod pa yis khru gnyis so; ;dgra nyams byed pas khru gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-11: bzlas pa nyid kyis khru bzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-12: lnga pa dngos grub thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-13: brgyad pa mkha' la 'gro ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-15: rgya mtsho dang ni dngos grub [?] gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-16: khyim du'ang rung ste gtsang ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-17: gzhan du g-yogs par byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-18: las la shis pa gang rung gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-19: thig gis dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-20: gru bzhi pa la grva bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-21: sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-22: dkyil 'khor che gsum byas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:27b-23: steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-2: chos ston par ni mdzad bzhin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-3: g-yas su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-4: tshangs pa'i dbyug pa spyi blugs phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-5: g-yon du 'phags pa phyag rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-6: rdo rje'i phyag gam de gzhogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-9: dbus kyi cha ru gru la zhon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-10: gru yi srog shing sgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-11: dang por rdo rje rab 'joms dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-12: sgyu 'phrul dang ni tum bu ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-13: gnyis par rdo rje khu tshur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-14: rgyal mar bcas pa'o gsum pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-15: lus dmar dang ni rnam rgyal bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-16: bzhi par rdo rje bsags mtha' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-17: mi thub mar bcas lnga pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-18: lto nag gzhan mi thub dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-19: ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-20: ser po nag po go rims bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-21: lha rnams dgod par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-22: dkar po'i gos dang dkar po'i rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-23: be con rdo rje gtun shing dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-24: gzhu dang ral gri mtshon cha'i phyag; dbus su zla nyi padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-25: lha rnams mngon sum dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-26: gru yi 'og tu me dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-27: chu yi gter ni gnas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-28: dung dang nya dang chu srin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-29: rnam par brgyan pa'i shar dang lho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-30: nub dang byang du dbang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-31: gshin rje chu lha lus ngan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-32: bzhon pa bcas shing phyag rgyar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28a-33: legs par dkris pa'i bum pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-0: @28b dri yi chu yis yongs su bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-1: yal 'dab kyis ni nye bar mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-2: grva rnams su ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-3: 'dir ni bum pa lnga pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-4: rin chen gyis brgyan 'jam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-5: gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-6: sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-7: kha ni dgab par byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-8: gdugs sgreng me tog phreng ba dbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-9: shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-10: dkyil 'khor phyi ru rgya mtsho bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-11: dung dang padma la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-12: ri yi rtse mo yis kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-13: rgyal mtshan rnams 'khrugs bla re bres //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-14: aindra n'i la gser dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-15: dngul dang zangs dang lcags rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-16: phye mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-17: lha yi me tog bdug pas bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-18: rnam pa sna tshogs gtor mas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-19: dus kyis non pa'i me tog 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-20: dbyig gser sna tshogs rin chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-21: bza' ba phyi rol gcal du dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-22: ri bo'i steng du rab 'jug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-23: snying po phye mas spyan drang sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-24: las rnams kun dang gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-25: de nas gang gis dkon mchog gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-26: dad pas byang chub sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-27: bud med skyes ba gzhon nu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-28: bsnyen gnas byas pa gos kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-29: gdong ni nye bar bcings pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-30: dam tshig gis kyang mnyan par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-31: dbyig dang gser gyi me tog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-32: lag pa yis kyang dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:28b-33: de ni gang du lhung gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-2: gdong phye lha rnams bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-3: sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-4: yang na nyin dang mtshan mo ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-6: de nas gzugs brnyan 'byung ste aa shvattha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-8: au dum b'a ra zhi ba can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-11: na ga ge sar gyis rgyas pa can dang; bil ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-13: ko tha yis mngon spyod can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-15: skal ba ngan pa rnams la bad kan mthar byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-18: smyo bar byed pa la tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-19: mya ngan med pa'i shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-22: skal pa bzang po nyid la aa sthi datta las byung ba rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-23: las thams cad pa la gser las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-24: rgyal srid 'dod pas ni dngul las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-25: zangs ni skal ba bzang po'i ched du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-26: lcags las byung ba ni mngon spyod can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-27: nyams par byed pa la tsam pa ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-31: nor 'dod pa yis ni sna ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-37: skal ba bzang po 'dod pas ni padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29a-39: zhi ba can la autpal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-0: gzhan la yang dri @29b bzang po can gyi me tog go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-1: rgyas pa can gang la dris dman pa'i me tog go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-3: nyams par byed pa la sogs pa la ni tsandan la sogs pa'i dri 'phrog pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-7: skal ba bzang po nyid la de lta bu'i bdug pa lag pa sbyar nas snying po'i sngags 'di rnams kyi las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-9: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-10: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-11: na ma shtsa turn'am bha gi n'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-12: na mo de ba tum bu ru s'artha k'a ha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-14: dzam bhi ka ro ti aa mi tram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-19: mo h'i ka ro tya mi tram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-21: aindhi ka ro tya mi tram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-22: dza ye a'a gatstsha bi dza ya a'a gatstsha dzam bha ni aa gatstsha stam bha ni a'a gatstsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-28: sa m'a ya yu p'a l'a y'a th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-29: su tu tu susla badzra bhanydza n'i ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-30: rig pa 'di ni stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-33: phug tu rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-36: mig sman ldong ros sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-40: rang gi yul so sor skyong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:29b-44: mche ba rab bsnams la yang dag par gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-1: thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-2: khros pas rgyal po'i khab rab tu sgrub pa ste de lta bu la sogs pa'i las gzhan rnams kyang rang gi 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-3: sring mo bzhi'i snying po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-4: de nas slar yang dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-5: khru bzhi pa gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kun nas rta babs kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-8: lus ngan rnams bzhen pa dang bcas mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i sgo skyong dang gsum byed du gzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-9: byang gi rab tu thob par bya ste cha gsum byas nas steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-10: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang phyag g-yon pas rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-12: kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-13: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g-yon du rdo rje lcags kyu lcags kyu lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-14: gzhan du rdo rje lcags sgrog lcags sgrog lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-15: thams cad kyang ri'i rtse mo la yang dag par gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-16: dbang ldan gyi phyogs la brten pa'i lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-17: khyu mchog dang bcas pa yang dag par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-18: gzhan rnam pa gsum rim gyis mtshon cha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-19: gnas dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30a-21: nag po chen po rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-0: 'od srung dang @30b sna tshogs bshes gnyen lag pa rnams ril ba spyi blugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-1: chu snod phyag na bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-5: stod g-yogs ljang gu can lag na be con thogs pa cod pan gyis brgyan pa phyag na tog skyong bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-6: rna ba la rgya skyegs kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-7: rgyal ba dkar po phyag na rdo rje thogs pa stod g-yogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-9: rnam par rgyal ba lus dmar po phyag na gtun shing thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-10: gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-11: gser gyi kha dog can gyi gzhu phyag na bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-12: gzhan gyis mi thub pa nag mo gos khra bo'i stod g-yogs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-13: gos nag po'i sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-14: phyag na ral gri thogs pa gru la zhon pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-18: nang du padma rab tu gtor ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-19: byang gi sgo ru log 'dren chen po g-yas kyi gzhogs su chu bo rab med khor yug tu rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-22: dpal be'u rnams kyang kun tu bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-23: de ltar thams cad yang dag par bris te de nas ji ltar 'byor ba'i gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-24: thug pa rnam pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-25: bza' ba rnam pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-27: bza' dkris pa'i bag zan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:30b-32: sbrang rtsi ji ltar rigs pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-0: chu'i bum pa bzhi ji ltar 'dod pa'i yal 'dab kyis @31a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-2: bum pa dri'i chu thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba sa bon thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-5: gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-9: yal 'dab kyis brgyan pa'i bum pa rnam pa lnga lnga rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-10: phyi ru rin po che rnams kyis mngon par bkram pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-11: de lta bu la sogs pa'i bkra shis pa rnams byas nas phyi nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-12: de nas sngon du slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-13: 'di las gzhan pa'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-14: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-15: na ma shts nda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-16: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-17: na ma shtsa turbha gi n'i n'am ma ma dza y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-19: sngags 'di rnam pa brgyad kyis sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-24: thal bas dri med nyid sun 'byin pa'i cha byad kyis kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-25: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-26: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-27: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa t'a ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-28: na mo bi dza y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-31: ku m'a ra ni bishnu mu khe ra te sha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31a-32: rig pa 'di 'bum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-0: de nas brgya byin gyi gnam lcags phog pa'i shing blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par gyur nas gang du mchod rten ring @31b ba srel dang bcas pa der song nas bum pa bzhi po thams cad kyang me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-1: yal 'dab kyis kha brgyan pa bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-2: de nas ku sha bting zhing bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor lcags gsum bcings pa'i phur bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-3: rkang pa g-yon pa lag pa g-yon pas mnan te ji srid du sngags mi snang bar gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-4: lag pa gtang bar yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-5: de nas phur bu de dgon par gdab par bya ste phur bu khyim du 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-6: cho ga 'di nyid kyis btab nas phur bu rkang pa g-yon pas yang dag par mnan nas dbang du gyis shig ;grong khyer 'jig pa'i lag pa btsir bas phyag rgya thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-7: dug byas pa rnams kyang 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-8: skye bo'i nang du'ang gdab par bya ste thams cad du 'gyur ro; ;gzhan la'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-10: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-11: mah'a yaksha se na pa t'a ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-14: na mastum [?] chu [?] sarba ba ha sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-20: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sngags 'di thod par khrag gis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-21: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags par byas nas chu la dor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:31b-22: rnam pa thams cad pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-2: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-3: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa t'a ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-4: na mashtsa ti sri n'am bha gi n'am n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-5: na mo dzambha ni ts'a tu ts'a tu tsa tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-6: rig pa 'dis rgyal gyi zla ba la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu na le sham gsum khar bcug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-7: de nas na le sham gcig khar rab tu bcug ste gang mig mi 'dzums par lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-9: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-10: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-11: na mashtsa ti sri n'am bh'a gi n'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-12: na mastumbu ru mah'a s'artha b'a h'a ya; na mo dza ye bi dza ye aa dzi te aa pa r'a dzi te sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-13: rig pa 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-14: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos nas mar me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-16: phreng ba la sogs pa phul te mchod pa rgya chen po byas te chu rang nyid kyis blangs nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste thun gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-17: de 'thungs shing khrus byas nas cho ga de nyid kyis tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo zos nas de lta bu brgyad zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32a-18: de nas phyogs bzhir rig pa'i gnas rnams kha ru rab tu 'jug par byed de thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-0: @32b na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-1: mah'a yaksha se n'a ba ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-2: na mashtsa ti sri n'am bh'a gi n'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-3: tantri mi li mi li sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-4: rig pa 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te lag pa g-yas pas khu tshur byas nas nyi ma bcu gsum du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-6: mche bas shi ba thams cad slong ba 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-7: khu tshur gyis gdon rnams 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-9: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-10: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa t'a ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-11: na mashtsa ti sri n'am bha gi n'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-14: su tu su tu badzra pra bhanydza n'i ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-15: sngags 'dis ba byung gi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa byas nas der b'a sha ka'i yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-16: sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-17: nag po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-18: gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-19: 'dis kyang khros pas rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu bsgrubs par bya ste kun tu rgyu rab tu zhugs nas de la sol bas mngon par bris te rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-20: de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-21: de nas phyag rgya rab 'chad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-22: dge ba'i lag pa las kun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-23: las gang cung zad bya ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-24: kun la lag pa g-yon sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:32b-25: mthe bong can la bzung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-2: sdigs mdzub can ni gnod sbyin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-3: dri za la ni gung mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-4: 'byung po rnams la ming med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-5: klu la lag pa mthe'u chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-6: srin po rnams la mthil du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-7: dbyug pa'i phyag rgya yi dvags rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-8: phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad du bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-9: mthe bong rdo rje rab 'joms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-10: sdigs mdzub rdo rje khu tshur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-11: gung mo rdo rje lus dmar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-12: mthe chung nag po'i yan lag can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-14: rang gi gzugs kyis rang rang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-15: phyag rgya lnga po rnam par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-16: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skang ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-17: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-18: sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mas ji ltar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-20: rig pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched du ji ltar bya ba bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33a-23: des na gang rig pa 'dzin pa bkrus bzhin pa rig pa de rjes su dran par byas nas rig pa med par khrus bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-0: rnam par dben pa'i phyogs ma @33b yin par bzlog pa nyid de rnams ni lus rtsub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-2: gang lam du 'gro ba grong ba'i chos kyis gos pa rnams la yid kyis bzlas ba byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-3: rtag tu sems g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-5: gang yang yang nas yang du rig pa thun mong du 'pho ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-6: gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-7: sbyin sreg dang bral bas bzlas pa byed pa ni rtag tu don nyams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-9: gang zhig slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa rang gi rig pa la brnyas pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-10: lha la spyod par byed pa ni log par 'dren pa dang skrag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-11: rtag tu 'jig rten dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-12: rtag tu yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-13: rtag tu'ang rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-16: 'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-17: bdug spos la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya bkur stir bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-19: srog gcod par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-21: dge slong ma sun 'byin par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-22: mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-23: tshul dang bral bas dge 'dun gyi rdzas la yongs su longs spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:33b-25: bcos pa'i chang la yongs su 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-0: @34a *// dge slong ma gsod par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-1: zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-2: dam tshig med par khro bas zas rdzi bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-3: 'thor bar byed pa dang; dam tshig med pa shi ba mthong nas 'gro bar mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-5: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-6: sngags sbyin par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-7: de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-8: dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-11: lha gzhan rnams la'ang dri med nyid kyis 'gom par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-12: dam tshig med par dung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-36: mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams kyang 'gom par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-37: sna tshogs byed pa mthong nas rkang pas gnon par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-38: rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34a-39: dngos grub ster bar mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-0: bza' ba'i cho ga'ang 'dir @34b til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-5: spu pa li ka mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-8: dri med nyid bza' ba'ang spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-9: lha'i dri med nyid gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-11: chu la gnas pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-13: nags kyi bdag po gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-14: rtsa ba 'byin par byed pa'ang spang par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-15: rig pa rjes su dran par byed pa nyid kyis rtag tu gos gtsang ma bgos pas bya ba thams cad la bstan pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-16: gzhan rig pa'i cho ga thams cad la mchod par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slar yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-18: grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-19: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa'i yi ge rnams thabs dang bcas pas bde blag tu sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-20: sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-21: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar yid kyis grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-22: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-23: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-26: ghu ni ghu ni la la la siddha siddha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-27: pa r'a kra ma sv'ah'a; aa mi ta bh'a suta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:34b-28: sarbe shtsa a'arya aa ba lo ki te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-0: 'di ni 'phags pa zla ba ma zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nu mo ste las thams cad byed @35a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-1: pa'o; ;sgrub pa pos rtag tu gtsug phud bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-3: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-4: de la 'di ni tho rangs langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas dkyil 'khor byas nas me tog la sogs pa gtor te lnga brtson pas brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-5: mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-6: yang na gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-7: de nas dkyil 'khor du rtse tr'i dzi kam rab tu gtor nas gang 'dod pa de skrod par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-8: bklags pas grub pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-9: yang 'dir rnam grangs kyi gter 'dir de dag gcig tu reg pa de dran par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-10: de nas gshed byed skyed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gi me rab tu sbar te dar chen pos bskor la ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-11: nyi ma bdun pa la 'jigs pa'i nga ro can gyi gshed byed mtshan mo phyed nas langs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-12: yang dag par bsngags pas ji ltar brjod pa'i gnas su'ang byin gyis brlabs pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-13: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas ji ltar bde bar mngon par bde bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35a-14: de nas gnas kha cig tu mi rnams 'chi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-0: @35b gnas kha cig tu me 'bar bar mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-1: gnas kha cig tu lcags sgrog bcings pa mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-2: de ltar gshed byed de rnam par rgyu bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-3: de zhi ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar padma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-5: dgra rnams bskyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gi me rab tu sbar te yungs kar dkar po la til nag po'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-7: de nas rims kyis 'dzin par 'dod na dur khrod kyi me la dur khrod kyi thal ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-9: zhi ba'i don du chu la brgya rtsa bzlas te mgo bor sbyin par bya'o; ;rims las grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-10: mgo bo zug rngus 'dzin par 'dod na ba byung gi gzugs brnyan la mi rus kyi phur bu la stong phrag brgyad bzlas la mgo bor phur bus gdab bo; mgo bo zug rngu chen pos 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-11: phur bu bton pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-12: dbang po la btab na ma ning du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-14: snying gar btab na gzar chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-16: seng ldeng gi phur bu sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:35b-17: khrag gis btags pa srad bus dkris pa la brgyad brgya bzlas pa mi rus kyi phur bu'i mgo bor gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-0: @36a *// dgra'i sgor btab na tho rangs 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-1: ji srid phur bu bton par ma gyur gyi bar du gang du'ang gnas par mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-2: rgyal po skyed par 'dod na lha chen po'i khang par song nas lha la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-3: khrag gis byugs te sha chen po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-4: nimba'i 'dab mas kyang mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-7: ske tshe rnams gcig tu byas nas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-8: brgyad brgya dang bos rang gi sha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-11: bzhi pas mtshon cha chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-13: drug pas ma he ste khro bo chen pos dkris pa'i las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-14: blo bzang po nyid nyams par byed par 'dod na nimba'i shing gis me sbar nas nimba'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-15: dur khrod kyi thal ba phan tshun bsres pas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-16: skad cig la nyams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-17: de nas lkugs par byed par 'dod na ka sa ma ya'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zangs kyi phur bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te dgra bo yid la byas nas kha la phur bu gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36a-19: phur bu bton na thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-0: ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung @36b ste so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-1: ma blangs par bza' ba rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-2: brgyad brgyar bzlas nas mgo bo la byugs bas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-3: gos la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-4: mig sman la mngon par sngags nas mig la bskus na khro bos dkris pa rnams kyis mthong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-6: lam du zlos bzhin par song na chom rkun rnams kyis 'joms mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-7: sor mo la lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro; ;gseg ma la brgyad brgyar bzlas nas chu la gtor na chu la rgyu ba thams cad rengs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-8: bcings pa lam 'gag pa la bzlas na thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-9: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du nye bar byugs nas sa la mtshon cha sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-10: gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-11: khyor ba'i chu la sngags nas steng du gtor bar bya ste dus ma yin pa'i char rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-12: thal ba la brgyad brgyar bzlas na thal ba 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-13: lcags kyi phye ma rdo'i ra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-14: sgron ma gsum gyis me'i ra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-15: bil ba'i 'dab mas bil ba'i ra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:36b-16: brgyad brgyar bzlas pa'i chus chu'i ra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37a-1: 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37a-2: rig pa bsgrubs pa las mchems med pa las grol nas byang chub kyi sems rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aushni sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37a-4: aa n'a ba lo ki te murdha ni te dzo r'a shi h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37a-11: phung por rnam par bshad de 'dab ma chung du'i rgyab tu gnas par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyud chung du las bris pa 'dab ma so sor la rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la ras byed du bcug nas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37a-12: yang na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa ste ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can dbang bo ma tshang ba min pas kha shar du phyogs pas ras rnams 'phrul 'khor la bzhag ste de'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37a-13: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-0: khyad par du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan drang bar byas nas de nas aarga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa ral pa gcig ma'i snying pos ras ris kyi spyan sngar khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du stong @37b phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-1: ras ris 'dri bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-5: yud tsam dge ba la snod sar par bzhag pa kha dog ma 'dres pa shin tu so sor btags pa'i kha dog gi chus sbyar nas ba lang gi spu'i pir gyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing ni sna tshogs pa'i gnas rab tu bsngags pa; bya'i tshogs skad 'byin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-6: dpag bsam gyi shing dang mtshungs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-8: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-9: skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-10: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-11: mdzes par snang bzhin pa'i lus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-12: gtsug tor nas 'od zer chen po gser gyi kha dog can 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-13: padma dkar po la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon gyi gzhogs su dkar po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-15: kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyi stod g-yogs bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-16: phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-17: gzhan du rgyu skar me bzhi la 'phags pa dri ma med pa 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'drir gzhug par bya ste; bcom ldan 'das kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-18: g-yas phyogs su thams cad dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-19: gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:37b-21: phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-2: mchod phyir thogs phrag pa la 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-5: sgrub pa po'i steng du phyag brkyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-7: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro bcung zad mngon par lhags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-8: bcom ldan 'das las cung zad dman pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-9: de'i g-yas kyi gzhogs su bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-11: rin po ches rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i lus can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-13: rnam par bkra ba'i gos bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-14: rin po che'i stod g-yogs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-16: bcom ldan 'das lag pa kha sbyor byas pas autpa la sngon po yongs su gzung pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-18: dang por bcom ldan 'das la rtog par byed bzhin pa'i sgrol ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-20: de nas rtsa ba'i padma la bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-21: g-yon du 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-22: gzhan du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i g-yas su klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas mgo bo bdun pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38a-23: phyag na padma'i sdong po bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-0: @38b rnam par bkra ba'i gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-1: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-2: g-yon du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-3: phyag na padma'i sdong bu bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa ba dang nye bar dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-6: rin po che'i stod g-yogs can; rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-7: tsang+ga tak phyag na bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-8: pus mo sa la btsugs pa'i lha mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i g-yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa ba dang nye bar 'khod pa'i thams cad dkar mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-12: thal mo kha sbyar du byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-14: bcom ldan 'das la nges par rtog bzhin pa'i bde ldan 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du sgrub pa po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lta bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-16: gos dkar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-19: rnam pa'i khyad par ji 'dra ba pus mo gnyis btsugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-20: lag pa spos phor thogs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-21: lha'i bu rnga bo che rdung bar byed bzhin pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:38b-22: sprin las glog dang bcas pa bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-1: ris kyi steng du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-3: nyi ma rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g-yas su nag mo gsus pa 'phyang pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-9: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-10: go zhes bya ba'i phags pas dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-11: gtsug phud la thod pa'i phreng ba 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-12: rdo ba la rab tu bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-13: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-14: phyag bzhi pa g-yas kyi phyag gis dgra sta yongs su bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-15: phyag g-yon pa'i dang pos khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-16: phyogs dang ldan pa'i lus la smin ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-18: bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-20: glang po che'i pags pas stod g-yogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-21: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bka' rab tu nod par byed bzhin par gyur pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sring mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-22: de ltar ras ris 'drir bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39a-24: tshad ma nyid kyi yan lag rnam par spangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-1: gzhan du'ang rung ste gtsang ma'i gan du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-2: de nas du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-3: gang thabs cig gsang sngags byed pa de'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-4: lha thams cad gsal bar byed par 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa'ang rung ste las brtsams par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-5: gtsang ma'i sa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyis thang la yongs su byug par bya ste de'i dbus su so phag gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-6: phyogs bzhi rnams su sa las byung ba'i rtsa ba nag po med pa'i chu'i bum pa bzhi la brgyad brgyar sngags pa bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-7: gzhon nu mas bkal pa'i srad bu tshon sna lnga las legs par dkris pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-8: dri zhim po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor byas phyogs bzhir chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-9: sha med pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-10: dri bzang po'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-11: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-12: zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhan nas 'gram gyi phye ma rnams la nye bar gnas par gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-13: shar du mngon par phyogs pas phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor du ral pa gcig ma la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-15: de nas ku sha ljang khu blangs nas gos dkar po gcig 'chang bar byas te ji srid du rkang pa gnyis kyi bar de srid du byabs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:39b-16: de nas mar gyi snod kyi steng du ku sha des dor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-0: de nas mar chung du de la gal @40a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-5: ji srid du rang 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-6: smra ba lhag par skyes kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-7: de nas bum pa re re blangs te zlos bzhin pas gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-8: sbyangs pa'i snod nges par gnas pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-10: 'di la'ang 'di'i sku mnye sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-14: du rushka rnams gcig tu byas nas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas te bsku bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-15: ba'i mar dang bsres pa'i bza' ba mchog bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-17: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu sngon por btsos pa la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas bcing bar bya ste mig gi nad zhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-18: mgrin pa la bcings nas skyugs pa sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40a-19: srad bu 'di nyid kyi ras yug 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-0: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pa gyad kyi lus la bcing bar bya ste g-yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro; ;khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te bcom ldan 'das ma la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas ba'i mar gyis sgron me dbul bar @40b bya'o; ;de nas byang chub shing gi me sbar nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i sra rtsi pog gi sreg blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-1: nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de'i nad yun ring por nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-2: bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed par 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gcig gis blangs nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i seng+ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-3: stag gi mdog can gyi bgegs rnams nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-4: de nas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas gtsang ma'i phyogs su khrag sgrub par byed pa nye bar thogs te las brtsams par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-5: de'i 'og tu phyogs bzhir rgya skyegs kyi lo ma la 'dug pa'i bgegs rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-6: bgegs rnams kyi dbus su bgegs chen po log par 'dren pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-7: lan gcig mngon par sngags ba'i tshon sna lnga'i phye ma de rnams kyis thog mar dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-9: dri dmar pos mngon par mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-10: phyogs bzhir mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-11: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:40b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-1: sngags pa'i srad bu dmar pos bgegs thams cad la g-yas skor du dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-2: de nas bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po bcing bar bya ste de rnams kyi dbus su au dum w'a ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas bgegs bcing bar bya'o zhes brjod nas sv'ah'a'i yi ges be'u'i lci ba la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-4: mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-5: de nas sgrub pa po de'i bgegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-6: log par 'dren pa thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-7: rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-8: de rnams ni de rnams kyis byabs pas log par 'dren pa chen po gcig tu bzhag nas bgegs rnams thams cad la me tog thams cad dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-9: srung ba thams cad kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-10: bdug pa ni log 'dren chen po rnams la ka ra p'i ra dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-13: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-14: log par 'dren pa dang bcas pa la gu gul dang mar bsres pas mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-15: de nas lte ba'i tshad du dong brko bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-16: der so so so sor bcug nas slar yangs pa'i sar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41a-17: de ltar rig pa 'dzin pa'i bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-0: ring bsrel dang @41b bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-1: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas au dum w'a ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te tshangs pa'i yam shing gis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-2: nyi ma brgya phrag gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-3: nyi ma brgya phrag gnyis su ts'a ru bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-4: khru bzhi'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-6: ts'a ru'i sreg blugs gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-10: nas kyi sreg blugs gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-12: thams cad du bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i don du nyi ma brgya phrag gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-13: dgra la bltas nas bzlas par bya ste rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-14: ma sha ka'i yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-16: mar gyis btags pa rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-17: gang la ltas nas bzlas pa de las su mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-18: chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas dug thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:41b-19: dug thams cad la 'dod pas byab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-1: pu la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas mig dag par bya ste mig nad nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-2: byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la srad bu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya ste grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-3: nad pa la bcing bar bya ste gdon thams cad mthu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-4: thal ba la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-5: bu ma thon pa la til mar yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-6: rmongs pa mngal gyi dus tshod la 'das pa la khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i mar la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-7: bza' ba mchog dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-8: bu skye bar byed do; ;de nas bu mo mang po can gyi yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-9: thal ba de bum pa bzhi chus kun tu bkang nas brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pa dkyil 'khor du gsum gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-12: shu dag la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas te lag pa g-yon la bcings na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42a-13: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog thun gsum du stong phrag sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-0: phyogs gcig la @42b yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-1: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pa byas nas mdud pa bdun bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-2: lag pa la bcings nas brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-3: g-yo ba'i dug mthu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-4: de nas mi bzad pa'i sbrul gyi mche ba'i dug la sv'aha'i yi ge'i bar du khyor ba'i chu blangs nas brgyad brgyar sngags te btung ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-5: dug nyal ba'ang slong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-6: de nas ma langs na phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par sngags pa byas te btung ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-7: 'jog pos kyang mche ba'i dug slong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-8: stan ganti ka la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa sa la byug pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-9: ma bcings par yang de nyid du skem par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-10: tshor ba med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-11: yams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la grong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-12: grong khyer gyi dbus su mtshan mo phyed nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad kyi thang la nye bar byugs par bya ste dkar gsum gye gtor ma byin nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-13: me tog la sogs pa'i gtor ma byin te lo ma'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-14: nyi ma gsum gyis grong gsum gyi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:42b-15: nyi ma bdun gyis khang pa'i yams nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-0: de nas nye bar zhi bar ma gyur na 'dir nyi ma bdun du bad kan mthar byed kyi yam shing @43a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-1: gis me sbar nas aaksha'i til mar gyis btags pa'i 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-2: nyi ma gsum la 'phral gyi yams nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-3: thal bas 'gram bcings te zlos bzhin pas gang mthong ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-4: gang ma bsgrubs par yang bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-5: cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar zla ba nya la gzugs brnyan la dang por nag po'i phyogs la mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste aargha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-7: mar gyis btags pas thun gsum du mdzub mo'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad ji srid bcom lnga pa'i bar du gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-9: de lta bu'i sbyor bas stong phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-10: stong phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya ste las gzhan rnams su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43a-11: 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-0: rgyal po'i blon pe dbang du byed par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa byas nas byang chub shing gi yam shing la aing+gu di til mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis @43b shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-1: nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-2: cho ga 'di nyid kyis grul bum dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-3: til btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-4: 'byung po dbang du 'gyur ro; ;dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i dum bu can stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-6: wa ta'i shing gi yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-8: bal gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-11: til gyi thug pa rnams kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig rigs bzhi dbang du byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-12: gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-13: lha chen po rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-14: mtshan mo gtsang mar langs nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-16: phyogs gcig la 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-17: zla bas 'ching ba chen po las grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-19: pandyi ka'i sbyin sreg gis khro ba nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-20: yang na til gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-21: gos 'dod pas d'ur ba'i myu gu'i sbyin sreg gyis shig gos zung brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:43b-22: thun mong ba'i skyes bu dbang du byed pa la go be tram gyis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-0: sbrang bu mchu rings kyi mchu bcing ba la s'a la'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg @44a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-2: stag gi mchu bcing ba la gi ri karni ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-3: seng ge'i mchu bcing ba la sing ha karn'i ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-4: sbrul rnams la n'a ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-5: zhi ba'i don du s'a la'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-6: 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-8: mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du nyi ma bdun nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-9: zla ba phyed du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-12: ma grub pa sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-13: gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa'ang rnam par 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-14: klu la sogs pa'i gdon rnams la phyogs bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-15: dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa bzlas pa nyid kyis byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-16: mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du tsher ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-18: nim pa'i yam shing tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-19: mtshan mo bdun gyis skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44a-20: skra las khyad par du phung bar byed pa la aa rishta'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig skyes pa'i sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-0: smyo @44b byed la rtag tu bzlas par bya ste thams cad phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-1: gi wang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas thig le byas te rgyal po'i sgo ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-2: shu dag la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas lag pa la bcings nas gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-3: gdon 'bros par byed pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad pa'i tshad byas nas brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pa gdon gyi gnas su gdab par bya ste gdon 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-6: 'bras bu la sogs pa brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas gang la byin pa de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-7: rig pas bgegs rnam par gzhom pa'i don du seng ldeng gi yam shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-8: nyi ma gsum nas bgegs med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-9: de lta bu la sogs pa'i thabs thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-10: thams cad du gso sbyong can gyi ras ris kyi spyan sngar bsgrub par bya ste ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-11: stong phrag blangs nas g-yas kyi gzhogs su bzhag ste re re la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas ma la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-12: bar skabs 'dir ras ris rab tu 'gul bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:44b-13: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-0: nam mkha' la lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra @45a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-2: dri zhim po'i rlung ldang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-4: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-5: rig pa'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-8: g-yang gzhi nag po thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-9: ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba 'byon par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer byung ste rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od zer de rnams kyis sems can dmyal ba dang; dud 'gro dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-11: yi dvags thams cad yud tsam gyi tshor ba las nyams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-12: rang nyid thugs rje chen po can sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-13: sgrub pa pa pus mo gnyis btsugs pas shar du bzhag pa'i rnam rgyal bum pas mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-14: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-15: mchog ci 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-16: gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-17: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45a-21: lus la dbang po ma tshang ba med pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45b-3: rig pa thams cad kyi dngos grub bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45b-5: sa chen po'i dbang phyug gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45b-6: gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45b-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang 'dod pa der yang 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45b-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub par byed pa ni rig pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45b-18: mi'am ci thams cad kyis mngon par 'dod pa sgrub pa bdun pa la mtshams med pa byed pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa de lta bu kho nas kun tu rtogs par bya'o zhes pa sgrub pa chen po dang po'i cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba dang po las btus pa rdzogs so;; ;;ras ris zhal shar du phyogs par bzhag nas de nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:45b-19: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs bcu pa la las brtsams par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-1: slong mo blangs pa'i bza' bas kyang rung ste gso sbyong can gyis byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-2: snying rje chen po dang ldan pas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de sems can rnams kyi don rjes su bsams nas nyi ma so sor 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa byed cing ku sha bting ba'i mal stan la khrus lan gsum byed cing gos lan gsum du brjes te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas nyi ma re re la ji ltar 'byor bas 'phel bar byed bzhin pas slong mo bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-3: rkang pa g-yon pas bgrod pa la sogs pa byed cing 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-4: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-5: bcu bzhi pa la sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dra ba rnams kyis btsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-6: de nas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir sa las byung ba bum pa rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-7: nag po med pa bzhi bcu dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-8: aa mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-9: sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar khru bzhi pa'i tshad la zangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-11: gser dang; dngul las byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46a-12: sa las byung ba'i bum pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-0: 'khri shing gis spras pa dag pa'i chus yongs su gang ba smra @46b ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-4: rin po che'i snying po me tog gis phon pos kha btab pa du gu la'i ras ma nyams pas mgrin pa bcings pi/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-5: rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-6: ras ris kyi g-yon gyi gzhogs na gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-7: de nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcu drug ras ris la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-8: mdun du dri bzang po'i tsandan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-9: 'o mas bkang ba'i brgyad po de rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-10: ba'i mar gyis mar me brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-16: bca' bar bya ba rnams kyis kham phor bkang nas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-17: thams cad du ras ris la bris pa'i lha rnams la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-19: phyi rol tu gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-21: 'bras bu thams cad ji ltar rnyed pas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir gtor ma dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-22: aa ga ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:46b-23: de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste yid rtse gcig pas phyogs su las brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-0: 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbad nas @47a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-1: aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-3: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-4: sems can thams cad kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-5: de'ang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lha'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-8: rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad 'gyur ba rjes su dran pa tsam gyis bdag nyid srung ba la lan gcig brjod pas gtsug phud bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-9: gnyis bzlas pas srung ba chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-10: gsum bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-11: bzhi bzlas pas mchu bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-12: lnga bzlas pas rkang gnyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-13: rkang bzhi pa srung zhing dbang du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-14: drug bzlas pas dur khrod du 'jug pa dang; bdun bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-15: zhi ba byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du aa rishta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-16: 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gi me rab tu sbar nas 'bras yos kyi sreg blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47a-17: nyi ma gsum la gcig gis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-0: @47b bdun gyis skye bo chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-3: zla bas yul 'khor chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-4: rgyas par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-5: 'bras thug po che'i thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-6: nyi ma bdun phrag gsum gyis rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-7: nyi ma bdun gyis rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-8: aa mra'i yam shing gi me rab tu sbar nas d'ur ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-9: smra ba rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-10: nyi ma shar ba nas ji srid nub kyi bar du aarga'i shing gi me la ming nas smos te lag pa g-yon pas lan bdun du phu ba ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-12: byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog brgya pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-16: nas rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-17: nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-18: mar gyi sbyin sreg gis rkang gnyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-19: rkang bzhi pa dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:47b-20: rgyal po'i aarga'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i rgya skyegs kyi lo ma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-0: @48a *// nyi ma bdun la dmag sde 'jig par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-1: seng lder gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas ku sha ljang gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-2: phyogs kyi dgra'i 'gro ba gcod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-3: 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas lha'i shing gi yam shing dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-4: zla ba gcig la 'og gi lha mo rnams dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-5: ts'a ru bza' zhing klu'i shing gi me rab tu sbar nas n'a ga ge sar la mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-6: nyi ma so sor 'phel bzhin mchod pa bya ste nyi ma bdun nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-7: zla ba gcig la steng du 'gro ba'i lha mi rnams dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-8: ts'a ru bza' zhing byang chub shing gi yam shing gi me rab tu sbar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-10: mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar rgyal po'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig; nyi ma gsum la rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-11: gang smras pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-12: 'dod pas nye bar bzhag pa ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-13: byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me spar nas aa mra'i 'dab ma rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48a-14: khyim gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi ba byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-0: ras @48b ris kyi spyan sngar mda' rgyang gi tshad kyi thang la nye bar byugs te nas kyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad la gzugs brnyan byas nas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i mtshon rnon pos btub cing btub cing sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-1: ji srid rkang pa'i bar ming nas smos nas khu tshur bcings te 'dug pa'i steng du lag pas dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-2: de nas khyim med par kun tu snang ba'i ched du rtog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-3: de'i mdun du khu tshur dgrol bar bya ste zhi ba nyid dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-4: de ltar nyi ma bdun la 'bangs nyid kyis nye bar gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-5: aa rishta'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas shing t'a ra brta'i zhogs pa rnams la lan bdun bzlas pas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-6: phyogs kyi bza' ba rgyun mi 'chad par skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-7: p'a la sha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas aa pa marga'i yam shing gis btags pa thun gsum du ming nas smos te stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-8: nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-9: ba byung gi gzugs brnyan byas nas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas pa'i mtshon rnon pos mgo bo nas brtsams nas rkang pa'i bar du gtubs nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:48b-10: nyi ma bdun la nga rgyal chen po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-0: dkar po'i bco lnga la sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis ba lang gi @49a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-1: pags pa'i tshad kyi thang nye bar byugs te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas gser ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-3: zangs kyi snod du ser skya rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar blangs nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste aa shva ttha'i 'dab ma'i nang la snod byas g-yas su bskor ba bzhi rab tu bzhag nas lag pa g-yon pas mnan te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-4: nyi ma brgyad pa la lag pa g-yas pa'i ming med kyi sor mos dkrugs te ji srid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-5: de nas btung bar bya ste go cha bcing ba'ang bcom ldan 'das ma nyid kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-7: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar zla ba'i cho ga'i nye bar spyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-8: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa thams cad la sa la ma lhung ba'i ser skya'i ba byung gis gtsang ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-9: ba byung des yang dag par rdzogs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-10: dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49a-11: de nas bil ba'i mgo bo'i 'dab ma rnams byas nas til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-0: nas zan bza' ste ma rnyed @49b pas aa ga ru'i bdug pa sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-2: nub tu'ang phyogs bzhir sngar brjod pa'i gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi ming smos nas brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-6: gtor ma so sor bzhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-7: 'di lta bu'i ming gi rig pa bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-10: 'o thug kyang shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-11: dri za rnams la gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-14: chang gis bkang ba can lho phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-16: grul bum rnams gtor ma la 'o mas bkang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-17: 'o thug nub kyi phyogs su bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-19: 'dab bzang rnams la gtor ma rtsab mos bkang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-21: zan yang byang gi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-22: gnod sbyin mo rnams la gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-25: bcom ldan 'das ma la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma phul nas me tog thams cad kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-26: de'i phyogs bzhi ru gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-30: dri'i sar dza ra'i gtor ma 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-31: zan dron dang phye phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-32: yod bzhin pa ma yin pas ji ltar 'byor pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:49b-33: ji ltar yod pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-1: ldan 'das ma la'ang mar gyi mar me dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-2: de nas myur du ril ba spyi blugs g-yas kyi gzhogs su gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-5: ku sha blangs nas lan brgyar mngon par sngags pa byas nas kha shar du phyogs te rig pa bzhi lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-6: brgyad brgyar mtshon las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-7: de'i ming nas smos pa nyid kyis dus gsum du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-8: de nas mtshungs par 'dor bzhin pa byas pa la bcom ldan 'das la gang me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-10: mar me'ang dor nas rnam pa gzhan gyi gtor ma thams cad blangs te 'phang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-13: yang na gzhan yang gtsang ma'i phyogs bla ga ba dang bcas par yang rung ste rnam par dor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-16: khyi rnams kyis mi za ba ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-17: rkang pa dag kyang rung ste mnan par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50a-18: yang na mes legs par bsreg par bya ba nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa thams cad la'ang gtor ma gshegs pa'i cho ga'o; ;phyi nas zla ba las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor phyogs su lnga byas pa zhes pa btags pa ma yin pa la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rang gnas su gzhag @50b par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-2: cho ga bzhin thams cad du rdzogs pa'i rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-3: snying pos las chen po thams cad ji srid par de bzhin kho nar sa la ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis sngar brjod pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor byas nas de bzhin kho nas gtor ma gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-5: me tog kyang ji skad gsungs pa bzhin phul nas byab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-8: gang zhig las chen por rgyas par byed par 'dod pas cho ga de nyid kyis ba sgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-9: snga ma kho na de srid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-10: ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos skra dang bral ba la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-11: gzugs brnyan zhal nub tu phyogs pa de'i g-yon gyi gzhogs su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-12: phyag bzhi pa gi wang dpal be'u bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-13: ji srid du bsgrub par bya ba'i rig pa de'ang de'i dbus su rgya skyegs kyi mdog tu snang ba gur gum gyis bris par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-14: dpral bar yang rung ste gser las byung ba'i dar thod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i g-yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:50b-16: sngo bsangs na bza' dkar po mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-0: autpa la sngon po phyag na @51a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-3: de'i g-yas su rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya chen mo phyag bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-4: rma bya chen mo'i bar du rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gser las byung ba'i gshog pa chen po rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-5: rig pa rma bya chen mo ni dkar zhing dag pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o; ;'di'i g-yas kyi phyogs su dzambu'i gling rtse mo gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-6: shing rta'i gdong gi rnam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-7: nub tu nub ba lang spyod kyi gling zlum por 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-8: byang gi phyogs su byang sgra mi snyan gyi gling gru bzhi mnyam pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-9: shar du lus 'phags por rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dri za'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
