K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-10: 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhogs su rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi bdag po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-11: nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gzhogs su rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang klu rnams kyi bdag po sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gser gyi stan la gos dkar po can ba lang gi mig can bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51a-12: 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhogs su thal mo sbyar ba byas pa pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-0: g-yas kyi gzhogs kyi gcig gi rgyab tu phyag na rdo rje phyag na rnga yab thogs @51b par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-1: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi khor yug thams cad du me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-3: sangs rgyas kyi shar gyi phyogs su shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling ngo; ;byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gzhogs su rgyal po chen po ngal sos po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-4: de nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te tshangs par spyod pa bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-6: zan bza' zhing dus gsum du kun tu ru'i bdug pa sreg cing ras ris de la rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-7: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-8: rig pa'i dngos grub bdag la gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-9: nyi ma phyi ma gsum la gso sbyong la gnas pa nyid kyis bco lnga la dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-10: dkar po'i phyogs la sa bon btang ba las khang pa can gyis nye bar sbyar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-11: bram ze gzhon nus bkal ba'i srad bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-12: gzhon nu mas byas pa nye bar blangs te sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi zhabs kyi drung du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-13: lcags lnga rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad kyi gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-16: tshon mo steng ste nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-17: lcags rnams sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi zhabs drung du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:51b-18: rig pa grub pa la lcags de rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-2: de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung ba ser skya las byung bas ba lang gi lag pa'i rnam pa shar du mgo bo bstan par nye bar byugs nas kha'i rtsa bar shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling zlum po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-3: lho'i rkang pa gnyis su 'dzam bu'i gling zur gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-4: lho nub tu ras ris kyi spyan sngar nub ba lang spyod kyi gling zlum po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-5: nub kyi rkang pa'i mdun du byang sgra mi snyan gyi gling gru bzhi mnyam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-6: gnod sbyin gyi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhal nub tu phyogs pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-7: de'i g-yon gyi gzhogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-9: sa las byung ba gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-10: de nas sangs rgyas la gus pa dang bcas pas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-11: me tog la sogs pa ser po ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-12: tshad med pa'i mar gyi mar me rnams dbul bar bya'o; ;bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyan sngar mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-13: gling bar rnams su sbrang rtsis bkang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-15: til mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-16: shar gyi phyogs su tsandan btags pa'i bdug pa dri za rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52a-17: bu ram gyis bkang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-0: 'o thug rnams lho'i @52b phyogs su bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-4: 'bras thug po che rnams bsres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-6: chad gis bkang ba'ang grul bum rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-7: nub kyi phyogs su mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-8: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul zhing 'o mas bkang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-10: 'dab bzang rnams la dbul bar bya'o; ;byang gi phyogs su kun tu ru'i bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-12: zho zan yang gnod sbyin rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-13: kuntu ru ka ma rnyed na tsandan btags pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-14: sra tsi pog kyang rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-16: sbrang rtsis bkang ba'ang phyogs bzhir rab tu grags shing ji skad brjod pa'i yul 'khor srung la sogs pa'i bza' ba shes pa'i gnas kyis brtags par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-17: chu klung 'khyil bas bkang ba'i bum pa re re 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-18: ji ltar rnyed pa'i rgya shug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-21: rgun 'brum la sogs pa rnams dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-22: sa bon thams cad kyang nyung du nyung du lhag ma dang bcas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:52b-23: de la gal te rig pa bsgrub pa bya bzhin pa la shar gyi phyogs su tse spyang mo'i sgra grag par 'gyur na de la gnas nas 'das pas shar gyi phyogs gang yin par gtor ma lhag ma dang bcas par bzhag ste rtag tu gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-1: phyogs su gtor ma lhag ma dang bcas pa bzhag pa tsam gyis gnas der 'jigs pa 'jigs pas gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-3: byang gi phyogs su gtor bar bya ste 'di ni yongs su spyod pa pos bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-4: rig pa sgrub pa pos rig pa kun tu sgrub pa la drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-5: rig pa 'dzin pa'i snga ma'i rtsa bar kha shar du phyogs te ku sha blangs nas nye bar 'dug cing nye bar 'dug nas rig pa 'dzin pas gling bzhi rnams kyi phyi rol tu phyogs bzhir khor yug gi ri'i ngos bzhi la zlum po ser skya'i ba byung de nyid kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-6: blangs nas nye bar 'dug pa de'i stan la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi bar du sol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-8: p'a la sha las byung ba rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-9: lhag ma la sogs pa'ang med la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-10: bsgrub par bya bar bsgoms te dang por mtshon cha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-11: de nas yongs su bzlas pa'i sv'ah'a'i mthar rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-13: aarga ma rnyed na au dum w'a ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-15: aa p'a marga dang; gzhan gang yang rung ba kun nas bsreg tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53a-16: de nas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-0: gang yin pa de la sngags 'dis ming @53b nas smros par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-2: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-5: aa ba lo ki te sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-6: sdags 'di brgyad brgyar bzlas la mdud pa brgyad byas te raksha sv'ah'a zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-7: srad bu de dag bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bdag nyid kyi lag pa la bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-9: de dus grub pa la lhag ma srad bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-10: sa bon la sogs pa rnams blangs nas yongs su spyod pa pos lha'i khang pa nam mkha' la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-11: lha mchod pas mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-12: de nas nad pa rnams kyi lhung bzed bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-13: btung ba la sogs pa rnams dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-14: lhag ma yid kyis bgos te chu klung du rab tu blug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-17: bla gab can gyis phyogs su sa la bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-18: mes legs par bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-19: gang la la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub par 'dod bas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'dis dang po kho nar byang chub kyi sems lhan cig bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thams cad kyang byang chub chen po'i mchog gi dngos grub kyi gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-21: de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rig pa 'gog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:53b-22: rig pa skye ba ste de'i phyir de la rig pa bsgrub par bya ste de la bgegs byed par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-0: @54a *// thog ma kho nar gzhan du rig pa sgrub par byed pa'i dus ni sa ga'i zla ba'i bco lnga nya 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-3: smin drug gi dkar po'i bco lnga la rnam par gang du'ang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-4: gang zhig drag po sgrub par byed par 'dod pa de rnam par 'dis nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas nye bar blangs te nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la sngags 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-6: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-9: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-11: sngags 'di sngon du srad bu dmar po bcings te dur khrod du ba lang gi pags pa'i rnam par ser skya'i ba byung gis nye bar byugs pa byas nas de bzhin kho nar gtor ma'i cho gas 'byung po gzhan rnams la gtor ma sna tshogs bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-12: yongs su spyod par byed pa po bzhis mtshon cha dang bcas pas yam shing bsreg tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-13: srad bu la mdud pa brgyad brgya byas nas bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-17: tshangs pa'i srin po la sogs pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54a-18: rig pa grub pa na de bzhin kho nar gtor ma'i cho ga gshegs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-0: rig pa sgrub pa thams cad la gang rig pa sgrub @54b par byed par 'dod pa des mtshan mo gtsang mas gtang mar gyur pa'i gos bgos te rang bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-2: aa ga ru nag po'i bdug pa bsreg cing kha shar du phyogs bas lan bcur brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-3: 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma rang nyid byon nas me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-5: gtor ma'ang so sor bzhes nas bdag gi bya ba 'di mdzod cig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-6: de bzhin du lho shar du kha phyogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-11: 'og tu'ang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-12: rang nyid kyis byon te bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-13: me tog la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-14: mar me so sor bzhes nas bdag gi bya ba'ang bya'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-15: phyir zhing tho rangs zhi ba'ang lan bdun nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-16: bcur de bzhin nyid du phyogs bcu rnams su spyan drang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-18: bdug spos la sogs dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-19: slar yang nyin mo rnam par mnan te gtor ma'i las thams cad byas nas ku sha blangs te nye bar 'dug par 'dod pas de bzhin nyid du phyogs bcur spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-20: bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-21: me tog la sogs pa'ang bzhes te bdag gi bya ba'ang mdzod cig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:54b-22: de nas ku sha blangs te nye bar 'dug ste ji skad bshad pa'i bsgrub pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-0: rig pa sgrub pa la mtshan ma 'di @55a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-2: rig pa'i ched du rmi lam mthong ba ni glang po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-7: rig pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid rnams kyang ste mthong bas rlung gi bya ba'i dngos grub grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-13: bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-14: gos dkar po'i bgo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-25: mar gyi gtor ma'i las la sogs pa rnams 'jug bzhin pas non par smra ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-27: 'bras bu la sogs pa mthong na ji lta bar ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-29: dbyar nye bar ma mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-30: rlan la gnas pa'i nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-31: gro rnams mthong na phyin ci log gi dus kyi char pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-32: ji ltar rab tu bsngags pa'i zhi ba 'dod pa ni bum pa gang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55a-37: 'bras bu rnams mthong na rab tu 'jug par bya bzhin pa 'di rnams ni mchog las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-0: rma bya la sogs pa rnams mthong ba @55b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-1: bltas nas dngos grub bo zhes rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i bya ba rnams la las rnams brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-2: phyin ci log 'di rnams mthong na gnyid mi log ste rmi lam du sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-17: dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-19: log par 'dren pa rnams te mi shis pa mthong na rig pa mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-20: bya ba thams cad la bgegs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-21: de la sngags 'di bgegs thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-22: aom badzra khu ru bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat; sngags 'di ni rta mgrin zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po'i ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-23: sngags 'di lhag par gnas pas bdag nyid bsrung ba byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-24: las thams cad sgrub pa la 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-26: byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la byabs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:55b-27: srad bu bcing bar bya ste dug byabs pa'ang ji srid du rig pa lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-0: de la bum pa la 'drir gzhug par bya ste gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu gtso bo'i sngags kyis mdud pa brgyad brgya byas nas bum pa @56a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-2: rim pa de dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-3: dngos grub med par ston bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-4: nyi ma gnyis pa la mdud pa thams cad dgrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-5: rnam pa gzhan du na rig pas bcings te ma grol bzhin pa don med par byed po de lta bu la sogs pa sngags des las bco brgyad du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-6: 'di ni lhag par gnas pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-7: sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs te de la rig pa'i sngags kyi sbyor ba'i khyad par brjod par bya ste gang du bsgrub par bya bzhin pa'i skyes bu la mthong ba sbyin par byed de de la skyes bu'i lhag pa'i lha de skyes bu la nye bar gnas par rtog par byed de sngags de gang gis bsgrub par bya bzhin pa la mthong ba sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-8: lhag pa'i lha de nye bar gnas par rtog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-9: 'di ni rig pa'i sngags kyi khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-10: sngags 'di'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs te de'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas de'i g-yas kyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-11: g-yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56a-12: de nas myur du shar du mngon par phyogs pas gnas nas ku sha blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-0: mar me la @56b sogs pa mchod pa byas aa ka ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-1: du rushka'i bdug pa bsregs te gtor ma thob pa'ang sbas pa'i phyogs bzhi rnams su phul nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ku sha blangs nas nye bar 'dug te nad thams cad khyad par bya ba par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-2: nad thams cad rnam par thim zhing grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-3: nyi ma bdun pa'i tho rangs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-5: sgrol ma'i rgyud de thams cad kyi cho ga 'khor dang bcas pa 'chang bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-8: dur khrod rnams su so sor gnas pa'i dge slong ma gzhan gang la las bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-9: sha za'i gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-10: de la shar gyi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas der dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-12: bdug pa la sogs pa phul nas bdag nyid srung ba'i don du lan nyi shu rtsa bdun bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-13: de bzhin du mtshan mo'i dus la bab pa na lam du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-15: srad bu'ang bdag nyid la bcing par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:56b-16: sngar brjod pas de rnams kyis kyang lan bdun mngon par sngags pas bris par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-0: de bzhin du snying por gdon rnams la sngar brjod pa'i cho gas @57a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-2: sngar brjod pa de rnams kyis kyang rig pa bdun po de rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-3: de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-4: me tog phul nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-5: de bzhin du grul bum gyi gdon rnams la sngar brjod pa'i cho gas byab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-6: srad bu'ang bcing bar bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-7: de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin du klu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-8: 'dab bzang gi gdon rnams la sngar brjod pas byab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-9: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-10: de bzhin du byang gi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams la sngar brjod pa'i cho gas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-11: de bzhin du phyogs bral rnams su'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-12: de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yang lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-13: gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-14: grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mtshan thams cad rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de sku mthong nas g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-16: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-17: mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57a-18: der rig pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-0: mngon spyod can ni bsgrub par mi bya ste sgrol mas non pa'i khro bo dang nye @57b bar sgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-1: ji srid ral gcig ma'i mdun na phyag na rdo rje dang nye bar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-2: khro bo'i mtshan nyid kyang 'chang bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-3: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par snum zhing sngo bsangs sngar brjod pa'i rnam pa las zhi ba'i gzugs can gyi mdun du rig pa gzhan yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-4: mngon spyod can gyi rnam par 'gyur pa'i gzugs can du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-6: rgyas pa can ni zhi ba'i gzugs can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-7: gang du sgrub pa po mngon par phyogs nas bltas pa der bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-8: ral pa gyen brdzes brjod pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rjes su gnang ba'ang bud med gang yin pa'i bud med de'i mtshan nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-10: cha byad 'chang bar bya'o; ;skyes pa yod na skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa skyes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas pa lag cha dang bcas pa ji 'dra ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-11: sngar brjod pa de 'dra ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-12: phyin ci log gi gzugs kyi dngos grub mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-13: ji srid du lha drag po de'i nye logs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:57b-15: slar yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can ma gas shing dum bur ma gyur pa dngos grub sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-0: de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil @58a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-1: 'khor 'di ni dam tshig thams cad skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor te rnam par rgyal ba mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba bkra shis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-2: bsod nams kyi las thams cad byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-5: nad pa med pa 'phel bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-6: dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyang dam tshig skyed par byed pa por 'gyur ro; ;sna tshogs pa'i chu klung gi 'gram mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-7: padma'i mtsho'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-8: chus legs par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi'i char byas nas skra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-18: chu'i tshad gang du nye logs na chu yod pa'i g-yas kyi gzhogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-19: nub tu gang du me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-20: 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-21: gang yang yid du mngon par 'ong ba gang du nor yod pa'i phyogs su gru bzhi pa; sgo bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-22: tshon sna lnga pa'i sa li'i phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-23: tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu nyid kyis thig btab nas au du ma w'a ra'i phur bu rnams kyis kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-24: dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes grangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58a-28: sbyor ba dge ba la de rnams kyis dang por dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-3: lnga par nag po zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-4: lhag ma shar gyi dbus su lha rnams bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-8: me tog thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa rab tu gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-9: de'i shar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-10: g-yon du dri ma med par 'gro ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhogs su sgrol ma bdun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-12: g-yon du dri ma med par 'gro ba'i bud med bdun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-13: dpal lha mo'i gzhogs su gos dkar mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-14: sgrol ma rnams kyi gzhogs su zla ba ma bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-15: zla ba ma nas brtsams nas dpal mo grags ldan mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-17: gzhogs su dkar mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-19: sgo'i phyogs su snying stobs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-21: dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi gzhogs gnyis kar tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-23: drag po'i gzhogs su lha mo dbu ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-25: sgo'i nang du dbyug gu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-27: gcig tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-28: gcig tu zhi ba thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:58b-30: rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i khro bo gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-0: de'i gzhogs su srin mo ral @59a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-1: gcig ma zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-2: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste khru bzhi pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-5: khru bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-7: phyag rgya rnams dgod par thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyi padma ni padma'i phyag rgya rgyas par bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs bzang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-9: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ni autpa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-10: dpal mo ni me tog kha phye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-12: gos dkar mo'i de nyid sdong bu dang bcas pa mchog tu rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-13: 'phags ma grags ldan ma'i sdong bu dang bcas pa'i me tog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-14: sgo rnams thams cad du dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-15: grva rnams thams cad du'ang ku sha re re la tsu ta'i yal 'dab bcu bkod de stod du ba dan bsgreng bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-16: de nas rang rang gi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya ste gshegs su gsol ba'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-17: yang na 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po tshar ba rig pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-18: yang na 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos me tog dkar pos spyan drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59a-23: mar mes mchod pa byas nas gtor mas nye bar mchod de bkra shis can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-2: snum khur la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-3: mon sran sde'u'i la du dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-9: 'byung ba'i zas snum khur gzhan rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-11: zho'ang ste gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-12: de nas slar yang dri bzang po'i dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-13: me tog gi mchod pa mchod pa byas nas chu las skyes pa ni khyad par du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-14: de nas re re sngags lan bdun bdun brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-15: yang na 'phags ma sgrol ma brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-16: nang gi bum pa gang yin pa de la snying po yi ge lngas stong brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-17: de nas me'i gnas su me nye bar bzung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-20: zas nyid kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga ji ltar gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-21: grangs med par de ltar sbyin sreg kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-22: phyi nas slob ma legs par yongs su brtags pa'i snod dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos yang rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-23: gos kyis gdong g-yogs te thal mo me tog gis bkang ba rab tu bcug ste gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-24: gang du lhung ba de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-25: de ltar dkyil 'khor du rab tu bcug slob ma dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-26: dbang bskur gang 'dod pa de byin te lho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:59b-27: nub nas shar du mngon par phyogs nas sra rtsi pog gi bdug pa mar dang bsres pas nye bar bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-1: ma gung la bum pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-2: sngags thams cad bdun bdun bzlas pa'i sreg blugs bsregs nas de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i las chen pos slob ma g-yon gyi phyogs su bzhag ste de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-4: des 'phags ma sgrol ma 'di'i phyag rgya bcings nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-5: de lta bus mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-6: de rnams thams cad du thams cad byas nas 'di myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-7: bcom ldan 'das ma la rab tu dad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-8: seng ge'i khri la gnas pa lta bu'i rgyal srid 'dod pas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-9: longs spyod 'dod pas rgya skyegs kyi 'dab ma la gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-10: log par 'dres pa nye bar phyung ba bdag gis so phag la kun tu gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-11: tshe 'dod pas thung du bcu la g-yo ba'i sa'i snying po la gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-12: slob dpon rgyas par 'dod pas aa rishta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-13: thod pa la kun tu gnas pa can nye bar phyung pa mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-14: lan bdun du mngon par dbang bskur bas ni dpal med pa la rab tu zhi bar byed do; ;lan bcu gnyis mngon par dbang bskur bas ni rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60a-15: lan lngar mngon par dbang bskur bas ni dbul po nor dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-0: phyi nas @60b slar yang mchod de gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-1: 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-2: dkyil 'khor 'di kun tu bris nas ring bor mi thogs pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das ma rab tu dgyes par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-3: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-4: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rjes su brtse bas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi bstan pa kun srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-5: yongs su bskyang ba'i ched du rdo rje'i rigs thams cad nyid du dngos grub byed pa snyigs ma lngas nyon mongs pa 'di la'ang chos kyi tshul thams cad lhag par gnas pa'i ched du sgrol mas non pa dang mtshungs pa las byed pa phyi ma 'di'i lam rab tu gnas pa'i ched du 'di skad dus kyang smras smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-6: bcom ldan 'das rab tu gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-8: sngags kyi spyod pa de lta bu 'di ni ci nas de sems can rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyur yongs su 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-9: ci nas de thams cad 'thab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-13: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-14: dus ma yin pa'i char ltung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:60b-15: sdigs pa'i char byed pa'i mi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-2: de la'ang bkra mi shis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-13: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma bud med kyi gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-14: cha byad kyis de la chom rkun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-17: rnam par 'tshe ba sel bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-26: mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-27: sems can thams cad kyang sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa yongs su longs spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-35: stan rnams rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-36: sems can thams cad chos 'dod pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-37: dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa la sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-38: 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar smon lam mthar thug pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61a-39: gang du bdag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-0: bdag la sangs rgyas bcom @61b ldan 'das kyi las kyi dngos grub yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-2: skyes bu'i rnam pa 'di nges par sgrol ba'i ched du de lta bu'i gzugs kyis bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-3: phyag na rdo rje bud med kyi gzugs kyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-5: cha byad kyis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-6: de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rjes su brtse bas brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-8: 'jig rten skyong ba gzhan rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-16: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams dgug par byas nas de lta bu'i gzugs kyis skyes bu chen po'i rnam pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-17: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-18: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-19: de nas sh'akya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:61b-24: 'jig rten skyong ba gzhan rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-0: gzi brjid che zhing gzi brjid che ba'i mi rnams yong bar byed cing sangs @62a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-1: rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-3: sngags kyi tshig rnams ni gang khyod kyis nus pa de lta bu'i gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-4: skyes bu'i rnam par byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-6: khyod kyang skad cig gis tshangs pa'i cha byad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag par sbyor bar byed do; ;yud tsam gyis dge slong gi cha byad kyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-9: yud tsam gyis brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-10: skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs kyis gzhan gyi gzugs sprul te dbang sgyur gyi lha'i dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-14: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62a-21: dbang phyug chen po dang; gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-0: phag sna tshogs pa'i @62b gzugs kyi 'dab chags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-10: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-11: rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzugs kyis spras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-12: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-17: dbyibs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gzugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-19: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mthu chen pos 'dir 'ongs pa ste bdud dpung dang bcas pa'i yul la nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-20: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-21: gang du bdud dpung dang bcas pa'i yul du gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-22: sngags kyi spyod pa'i thabs kyis sems can rnams yongs su spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-23: ji 'dra ba'i sems can phyogs bcu rnams su tshad med cing grangs med pa rnams yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-24: yongs su ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:62b-25: bsam pa ji lta ba'i gzugs kyis rang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-0: ji lta bus gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams gnas la @63a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-1: gsum pa phyir mi ldog pa la 'jog par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-2: ji srid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis gang yang sems can gyi chags pa zil gyis mnan te rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-3: yongs su longs spyod par 'dod pa de rnams kyis zhen pa spang ba'i ched du de rnams la yo byad rnams byin nas phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed do; ;nges par slar yang dam tshig des byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-15: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams yid kyis bshad pa la bdag rab tu spro ba chen po bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-16: bdag rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po smras pa'ang bcom ldan 'das dang phan tshun phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-18: 'di ni bdag gi gsang sngags 'bras bu chen po gzi brjid chen po las kyi don thams cad sgrub pa por 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-20: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-21: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63a-25: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-0: ma h'a satva @63b ya; mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-2: aa nu kam pa k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-3: sarba satva bya sa na gh'i te ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-4: sarba satv'a maksha ka r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-5: sarba birya r'a dza aa dhi bhi kr'am t'a ya ma h'a r'a dza prokte /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-6: 'di rnams la phyag byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub pa bgegs thams cad gsod par byed cing thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-12: dzva li ta bi phu lingka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-15: badzra khu ra nir gh'a t'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-23: aa pa ri mi ta b'a l'a kra ma bh'i ta bhu ta ga nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-27: pa ra mantra siddhi me di na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-29: dzva la ra pi sh'a tsa gra he shu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-33: ai mam dushta gra ha dushta gra ha sarba p'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-38: aa nu dzny'a ka ra sh'i ghram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-44: badzra a'arya khu r'a ni gh'a ta na ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-45: pa ra mantra bi n'a sh'a n'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-46: tre lokya bha yam k'a ra ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-47: sarba karma shu aa pra ti ha t'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:63b-48: badzra ku lo tra sa n'a ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-1: brgyad kyis lhag pa'i bcu bzhi la brten pa'i rta mgrin gyi zhal gyi sngags rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-2: aom badzra khu ra bi kri t'a na na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-3: nye ba'i snying po'o; ;aom ha ya gr'i ba hri da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-15: pa tsa pa tsa; grihna grihna /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-23: bi dhu na bi dhu na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-32: ha ya gr'i ba pri ya dzv'a la aa bi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-36: buddha dharmm'a sam gha ba tsa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-38: dz'a ti ma nu sm'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-39: hri da ya ma nu sm'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-40: bi ki ra bi ki ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-45: ni ha na ni ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-49: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-50: 'di'ang stobs dang pha rol gnon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-51: dpag tu med pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po lus kyi mchog gi gzi brjid rnam par 'jig par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-52: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug cing mchod pa'i rjes su gnang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-53: rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64a-54: rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-7: lto 'phye chen pos yang dag par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-11: rnam par 'gyur ba chen po mche ba gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-12: rta mgrin gyi rgyal po'i cho gar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-13: sdig pa byang ba byas nas mchod rten du 'bum phrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-15: de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste dkar po'i bco lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas kha tshar gyi rtse mo ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis pir gtsang ma sar pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan padma'i gdan la gnas pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-16: g-yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchod phyir thogs dkar po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-17: ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-19: ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus su 'od dpag med dkar po sbyangs pa'i snod kyi nang du gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-20: phyag g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-21: g-yon pas padma rab tu sbyin pas brel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:64b-22: sgrub pa po'ang nges par rtog bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og gi g-yon du ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba'i rta @65a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-1: mgrin rig pa'i rgyal po bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-2: rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal spyan dmar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-4: ae na ya'i phyag chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-7: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-8: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par rtog bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-9: 'bar ba'i zhal padma'i phreng ba drug cus dbu la brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-10: de yi nye logs su brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa lag na spos phor gyis brel ba pus mo gnyis btsugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon gyi gzhogs su khro bo la nges par rtog bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-12: cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin rdo rje la nyug par byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs gnyis su padma'i steng du gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-15: padma de'ang klu gzhon nus yongs su zin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-16: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ri mo'i las rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-17: mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas bgrang phreng bzhag nas mar gyi mar me rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65a-18: dkar po'i gtor ma phul nas de nas rig pa 'dzin pas snod spyad pa byas pas mtshan mo gcig tu rab tu bcug te gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-0: de nas phyung ste rgyal gyi lcags @65b las byung ba'i 'khor lo gso sbyong can gtsang ma dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'i las byed pas byed du bcug nas sor mo brgyad pa rgyas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-2: rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-3: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'khor lo de'ang ba byung lngar mtshan mo gcig tu rab tu bcug nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-4: de nas bton nas khrus dang rjes su mthun par byas te gos dkar pos kun nas dkris nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag ste bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-6: mchod yon gyi snod blangs nas lha thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-7: mchod yon phul nas slar yang gshegs su gsol pa yang bdag la byas nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis yan lag bdun bzlas pa'i thal bas thal ba'i ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-8: sgron me la lan bdun bzlas pas sgron me'i ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-9: de nas srung ba'i chog byas nas yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas pas sa gzhi bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-10: chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas nam mkha' bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:65b-11: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba me tog dkar po dang lhan cig pa pus mo gnyis btsugs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drang bar byas nas mchod yon phul te stan de la lha rnams tshim par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-1: mas sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-2: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-3: rnga bo che'i sgra thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-4: sprin las go lu go lu sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-5: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-7: dung gi sgra thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-8: dril bu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-9: ha ha'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-10: rigs kyi bu de rnams grub pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-12: 'khor lo 'di byang chub sems dpa'i lam bgrod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-13: srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po sgrol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-14: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ma byon gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-15: byon pa na'ang mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-16: de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sgrub po la gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-18: bdud kyi phyogs de rnams nges par thul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i lam de rnams bgrod pa ci bya zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub pa po la phyag g-yas pas spyi bor nyug par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-0: nyugs pa'i skad cig de nyid las dpag tshad stong du rgya che ba'i bla re g-yer @66b kha'i dra ba 'phyang ba gser gyi 'dab mas rab tu 'phyang bzhin pas sgrol ma bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-4: rgyan gyi khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang rdo rje'i nus pas rnam par spras shing nya bar spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-5: bkra shis pa gzhan gyis kyang rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa glu len bzhin pa snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-9: pheg rdob rjes su sgrub pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa po'i bla re 'di rang nyid rig pa'i rgyal po de'i mthus ji srid zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-11: skar ma rnams yod kyi bar du 'khor dang bcas pa rol par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-12: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-13: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bya ba byas nas yongs su spyod par byed pa po dang lhan cig gzhal med khang la 'dzegs nas 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-14: 'khor lo de'ang 'bar bzhin pa gzhal med khang gi rtse mor rig pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rnam par 'gro ba'i yid kyis bde ba can du 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:66b-15: gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa der lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-3: rig pa 'dzin pas kyang bstod par bya bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-4: me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa rnams kyis bskal par gnas shing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mnga' bdag ste gang gi tshe 'chi ba na bram ze rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-5: mtshan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-6: dus thams cad mngon par shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-9: brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-10: sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-12: sangs rgyas la mngon par dang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-17: ri mo thams cad la mkhas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-18: bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang sems par byed pa de yid kyis rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-19: nad thams cad rnam par spang ba'i bram ze'i rigs su skye'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-20: lan bdun mngon par sngags te gtsug phud bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-24: dza yig gis gshegs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-26: sv'ah'a'i yi ges zhi ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67a-28: mdor bsdus na ston par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-0: rig pa 'dzin pa gsang chen mchog sgrub par 'dod @67b pa des gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-5: gsod par byed pa gzhan thams cad kyang 'dir bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-6: thams cad snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis te drag po yis ni ma yin pa kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-7: ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar bar mi bya ba'i gnas su sbyar bar mi bya ste gang rab tu sbyar bar byed pa de'i mchog gi sgrub pa mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-8: dam tshig shes pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-9: dngos grub 'di ni sgrub thabs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-11: sor mo la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas sprin gnon par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-12: mgo reg byas nas rgyan po rgyal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-13: tha snyad thams cad nyid la'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-14: yungs kar la lan bdun sngags pa byas nas ri la bsnun par byas te rnam par rnyil bar byed do; ;m'a la ri'i me tog la lan bdun mngon par sngags te bud med gang gis bsnams par sbyin pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-15: mgo bor blugs na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-18: aa ga ru nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-21: sa h'a ka ra'i snye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-22: tsha ba gsum gyi 'dab ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-24: ba gu la'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-25: pri yang ku'i me tog rnams phye ma zhib mor byas nas sbrang rtsis sbyar te tsa na ka'i 'dab mar ril bu byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:67b-26: 'di rnams lan lngar yongs su bzlas te byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-0: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis skyes pa dang @68a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-1: lhan cig bud med dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-2: sgrub pa la zhugs pas gang der gnas pa de nyid kyis phye mas yang dag par brtsams par bya ste log 'dren rnams kyis zil gyis mi non no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-4: yi dvags la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-5: ku tra dza'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-12: lag skyes kyi sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-14: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-15: sa bon rnams gcig tu byas nas ba ser skya'i gcin gyis bu mo'i lag par btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-16: de nas ril bu byas nas grib ma la m'a la t'i'i me tog dkar pos bgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-17: 'di rnams kyi lus byugs na log par 'dren pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-20: sha za la sogs pa rnams gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro; ;gal te mi sbyin na ba lang gi gcin la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas nad rab tu 'joms par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-22: pi tsu mar ta'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-24: shr'i bal sa ka 'di rnams phye mar byas nas gos la bdug par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68a-25: gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-3: ka dam pa'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-5: se pha li ka'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-7: na le sham dkar po'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-9: shu dag rnams ba ser skya'i gcin gyis bram ze'i bu mo'i lag par gso sbyong can gyis btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-10: ril bu byas nas autpa las bsgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-13: me tog sngon pos bsgos par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-19: srin po la sogs pa rnams gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-20: nad med pa'i le'u rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-21: de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung ste skyes pa'i ro ma nyams pa rab tu mdzes pa la dkar po'i bco lnga la rjes su byugs pa byas nas sbyangs pa'i snod du bzhag nas gso sbyong can des kyang skra bzhor du bcug nas me tog gi phreng ba mgrin pa la bcings te khron pa skam por zhugs nas ser skya'i ba byung gi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten de nyid du khron par bzhag nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-22: seng sdeng gi phur bu bzhi rnams kyis bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:68b-23: phyogs skyong ba rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-1: 'o ma dang sbyar te ji srid du ro de'i lce byung gi bar de srid du khar sreg blugs gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-2: de bcad nas ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-3: dpa' bo chen po pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-4: nyi ma 'char ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-5: lo stong phrag 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-6: ro langs kyi sgrub pa gnyis pa 'byung ste dur khrod kyi thal bas ro langs bris nas mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-7: gtor ma byas te de'i mdun du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas seng ldeng gi yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pas ji srid ro langs langs kyi bar de srid du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-8: gang yid kyis sems par byed pa myur du 'gug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-9: bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-10: de la zhon nas sbyin sreg gis 'gro bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-11: lo stong phrag bcu gsum du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-12: ro langs sgrub pa gsum pa 'byung ste ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas me la sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal bas ro langs bris nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te de bzhin du yang dag par bzhag nas be kangka ta'i sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg byed cing rig pa 'dzin pas be kang+ka tas kun nas bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69a-13: rtsa ba'i sngags dran pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-2: drag tu dgod pas grol bar byed na 'jigs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-3: ji srid rang nyid las kyi bar du rgya ba na rjes su 'gro bar byed da dbang po'i chung ma'ang myur du 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-5: de zos nas lo stong phrag bcu gsum du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-6: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-7: skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-14: 'o mas dkar po'i bco lnga la legs par btsags pa byas nas chu rnam par dbye ba gsum rnams rtsa ba'i sngags kyis yongs su bzlas nas de ser skya spyod du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-15: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rnam par dben pa'i ba byung gi gso sbyong can gyis ser skya de'i 'o ma blangs nas sa'i gong bu de mnye bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-19: rta gang yang rung ba ri mo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-20: gang yang rung ba byas nas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-21: ras ris kyi zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mar me rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:69b-22: srung ba'i cho ga byas nas au dum b'a ra'i yam shing gis sreg blugs bdun gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-0: dri'i chus lha rnams spyan drangs @70a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-1: nas slar yang rnam par phye ste mchod yon phul te rma bya de ras ris kyi mdun du bzhag nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o; ;de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par bzlas par bya ste gal te rma bya sgrub par byed na de yi dngos grub kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba ni rma bya skad 'byin pa dang; glang po che gul gul sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-3: nam mkha' lding gshog pa g-yo ba ste dngos grub kyi mtshan ma 'di rnams su gyur na rma bya'i rgyal po smin drug gnyis par 'gyur te brtson 'grus chen pos stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-5: lha rnams kyi rgyags pa gnon par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-6: bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-7: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te 'di ni dngos grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-8: de nas rdo rje rnam par byed pa des aa ka ru las byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-14: rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70a-17: sa ra las byung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-0: rtse gsum kha gdeng sgrub @70b par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-1: rdo rje rtse bzhi pa sor bcu drug pa las byed pa gso sbyong can gyi sa cha ma tshang ba med pa byed du bcug nas ser skya'i ba byung lngas rab tu bkru bar byas nas dkar po'i bco lnga la ras ris kyi spyan sngar gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-3: mchod pa rgya chen po byas te rdo rje dri'i chus khrur bcug nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bkod pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te dri chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-5: rtsa ba'i sngags brjod de rang gi lha rnams spyan drang ba byas nas mchod yon yang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-6: yang phul te slar yang gshegs su gsol nas mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-7: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje thogs te ji srid 'bar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-8: tsi ti tsi ti'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-9: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa nyid du bzlas par bya ste ji srid shar gyi phyogs su mthong ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can byang chub sems dpa'i sgrol ba po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-10: rta mgrin rgyal po rig pa bye bas yongs su bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:70b-14: ri khrod lo ma can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i snying po re re la bye ba lnga rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba bcom ldan 'das @71a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-1: kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs pas 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-2: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha rnams kyis me tog gi char gyi char 'bebs pas mchod pa bya bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ril ba spyi blugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-5: g-yas pas sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-6: ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-7: sbyangs pa'i snod dkar po nges par gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-9: ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med nyi ma ltar 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-10: gser gyi srad bu'i mchod phyir thogs pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-11: sgrub pa po la rnga bo che'i sgra zab mo'i tshig gis dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-12: de nas sgrub pa pos byon cing byon pa rnams la mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-13: gdan phul te smon lam gdab pa byas nas rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das la rjes su brtse ba nye bar blangs nas gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71a-16: dngos grub gzhan pa la bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-0: bdag @71b gi sdig pa byas pa la nor gyi dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-1: sgrub pa pos lan bcu gsum du smon lam btab pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la dngos grub gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug sgrub pa po'i spyi bor phyag g-yas pa reg par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-6: me tog gi chun po phul nas pus mo gnyis btsugs te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-8: rdo rje'i dngos grub bdag la stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-9: khyed kyis 'phrin las brtson 'grus chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-10: stobs chen pos rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i lus su mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-13: rdo rje 'di ni brtson 'grus chen pos stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-15: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thogs pa med par 'gro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-16: mthu chen po phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i lus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-17: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rdo rje blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te rig pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:71b-18: rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba lngas yongs su bskor ba rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rol par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-1: bzang po rab tu mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-2: mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-3: bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-4: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-5: skye ba dran te 'di ni dngos grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-6: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na nyi ma gung la dpa' bo'i rin gyis rna ba'i mig sman blangs nas ba ser skya'i 'o mas lan bdun du bkru bar byas nas ba ser skya'i ba byung lnga po de nyid kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-7: de'i 'og de nas mig sman zangs kyi snod du byas nas btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-8: de nas me nas bton te ras ris mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-9: gtor ma byas nas mig sman khar bcug ste dkar po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-10: zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ji srid dro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-12: 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-13: dro bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-14: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-15: 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-16: mig la bskus pas lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72a-17: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i phyug po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-0: de nas gnod sbyin mo sgrub par 'dod na skra dang bral ba'i ras gzhi la ri mo @72b mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi gzugs brnyan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-1: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-3: phyag g-yas pas mya ngan med pa 'chang bzhin pa bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-4: rig pa 'dzin pas dkar po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ras ris bzhugs nas gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-5: mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas rang gi lha spyan drangs nas mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-6: gdan phul te slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'o ma'i sreg blugs brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-7: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas ji srid gnod sbyin mo rang nyid 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-9: mchod yon phul nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-11: so sor bzhes la bzhugs shig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-12: rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis legs so zhes smras te bka' bsgo bar byed pa ci zhig bgyi zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:72b-13: de nas sgrub pa pos chung ma'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-0: gal te sring mo'o zhes brjod par byed na de nas sgrub pa po 'tsho ba las @73a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-2: de nas chung ma'o zhes brjod par byed na de nas sgrub pa po lag pas bzung nas 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-3: bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-4: zos pas skad cig de nyid la skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-5: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-6: nyi ma 'char ba'i kha dog 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-8: gzugs bzang po rab tu mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-9: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-10: de dang lhan cig rol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-11: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te skye ba dran no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-12: cho ga de nyid kyis kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pas bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi ga pur pri yang ku'i shing la 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-14: zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'i gnod sbyin mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o; ;de nas sgrub pa pos dkar po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73a-16: mar me byas nas rang gi lha spyan drang bar byas te mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-0: gdan phul nas slar yang gshegs su gsol te pri yang ku'i yam shing ba ser @73b skya'i mar gyis btags pa sreg blugs brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-1: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ji srid gnod sbyin mo rang nyid 'ongs pa de srid bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-2: 'ongs pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-3: 'di skad zer te bka' bsgo bci bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-4: de nas sgrub pa pos 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-5: bdag gi chung ma mdzod cig ces sgrub pa pos smras pa dang; rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis khyod kyis ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du'o zhes zer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-6: sgrub pa pos lag pas bzung nas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-7: bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-8: skad cig de nyid la gzugs bzang po rab tu mdzes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-9: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-10: cho ga de nyid kyis kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis gnod sbyin mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-14: kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis sgrub pa po la nges par rtog bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-15: aa ti mukta'i shing la 'phyang bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:73b-17: phyag g-yas pa'i sor mos sgrub pa po la sdigs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-0: de nas sgrub pa pos ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs su gsol te gos gtsang ma bgos nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum smyung @74a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-1: bar gnas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-3: slar yang mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol te ma'i sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-4: de nas sgrub pa pos rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun sngags pa'i m'a la ti'i me tog re res ji srid rang nyid 'ongs kyi bar du gnod sbyin mo la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-5: sgrub pa po lag pas bzung nas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-6: gnas su song nas bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do; ;skad cig de nyid la gzugs bzang por 'gyur te de yis lhan cig rol par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-7: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-8: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-10: cho ga 'di nyid kyis tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-14: pa ri p'a la p'a dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-19: padma'i sa bon rnams gcig tu byas nas dri'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74a-20: nam mkha'i chus bram ze'i bu mo gso sbyong can gyis lag par bstabs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-0: dri dkar po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dkar po'i brgyad pa la mchod pa byas nas @74b mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa gzugs brnyan de mchod rten gyi spyan sngar bzhugs nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drang bar bya ste mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-1: gdan phul nas slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon phul te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas padma ge sar la ba ser skya'i mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-2: de nyid du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas ji srid gnod sbyin mo rang nyid 'ongs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-3: 'ongs pha la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-4: de nas de na re bkas bsgo ba ci zhig bgyi zhes zer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-6: chung ma mdzod cig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-7: de nas des smras pa de bzhin bya'o zhes sgrub pa po lag pas bzung nas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed cing bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-9: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-10: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-11: skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-12: cho ga de nyid kyis ba ser skya'i mar sar pa la gzugs brnyan byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:74b-13: ji srid gnod sbyin mo byung ba'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-0: cho ga 'di nyid kyis tsandan dmar po las byung ba'i @75a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-1: gzugs brnyan byas nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te chu klung du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-2: skad cig de nyis la gzugs bzang po'i gnod sbyin mo 'ong zhing 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-3: nimba'i shing las byung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'di nyid kyi gnod sbyin mo byed du bcug nas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-4: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du chogs gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-5: mar me'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas sgrub pa pos rnam par dben par sbyangs pa'i snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-6: gos kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drang bar bya ste mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-7: gdan phul nas slar yang gshegs su gsol te ji srid du gnod sbyin mo rang nyid kyis gzugs gsal bar byed bzhin pa me tog gi phreng ba byas nas 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-8: de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-10: de nas sgrub pa pos chung ma mdzod cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-11: de nas de rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis sgrub pa po la me tog phreng ba sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75a-12: rang gi lag pas bzung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-0: bcud kyis len sbyin par @75b byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-1: skad cig de nyid la lha'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-2: gzugs bzang po rab tu mdzes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-3: de'i lhan cig rol bar byed cing dga' mgur yongs su spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-4: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed de lha'i tshe'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-5: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-7: sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-13: brtson 'grus chen po; skye ba dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-14: gnod sbyin mo'i le'u rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-15: padma'i mtshor song nas sgrub pa pos dpal mo 'ongs kyi bar sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-20: tsandan sbrang rtsis lhan cig btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-21: gang la sbyin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-22: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi phreng ba la yongs su bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:75b-23: de nas rtsal byed par 'dod pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po can mchod rten ji srid du mchod rten phyi ma rab tu g-yo bar byed pa de srid du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-0: de nas las kyi sgrib pa zad par byas nas mtshams med pa lnga byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur te rnam pa @76a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-2: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-3: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub par 'dod na kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras skra dang bral ba la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis pir sar pas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-7: 'og tu sgrub pa po spos phor lag na thogs pas pus mo gnyis btsugs pa byang chub sems dpa' la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-8: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyi ma re re zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa'i mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-10: mar me'ang ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-11: zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76a-13: mar me'ang byas nas smon lam btab par yang bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas m'a la ti'i me tog gis yongs su bkang ba'i dri'i chu'i snod lag pa gnyis kas blangs nas pus mo @76b gnyis btsugs te rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun brjod nas rang gi lha rnams spyan drang bar bya ste mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-1: gdan phul nas slar yang byabs te ba ser skya'i mar la btags pa'i m'a la ti'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-2: lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas srung ba byas pa ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste nga rgyal dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-3: mi smra bas g-yo bcom ste dran pa mchog gis dmigs par byas la ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-4: sems dpa' chen po byon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-7: sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-8: lha thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang tsandan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-10: gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams rin po che chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-11: lha ma yin thams cad autpa la'i char rab tu 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-12: drag po thams cad khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-13: dmyal ba pa rnams kyang skad cig de la bde ba skyes te mchog tu 'jigs pa smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:76b-14: dri za rnams glu snyan pa'i sgra thos par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-0: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang rang gi @77a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-1: rig pas yongs su bskor te ji ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-6: ji srid du drag bo sna tshogs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' byon pa mthong nas zhi ba'i sems su gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-7: sbrin las gu lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-8: sa rnam pa drug tu g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-9: phyogs bzhi skyong ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-10: log par 'dren pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-11: bgegs thams cad 'ong ste phyogs bzhi rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-13: drag po rab tu 'gro bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-14: dus ma yin par shing la me tog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-15: 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'ong ste phyogs gang du rigs 'dzin pa sgrub pa byed pa der sems dpa' chen po'i dga' ston la thams cad nyid 'dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-16: sgrub pa pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong nas mchod yon phul nas phyag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-18: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad la mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77a-19: gdan phul nas de nas lha thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-0: rig pa 'dzin @77b pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te srid pa gsum gyi chu bo chen po las bsgral bar byas pa de rnams nges par rgyal ba kun tu snang bas mnan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang lhan cig 'tsho ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-1: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i phyag g-yas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-3: sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nyug par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-4: de nas sgrub pa pos gang yid la snying po bsams pa der 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-5: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-6: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lha nyid gang 'dod pa de rnams chos gzhan du snang ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-7: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gru 'dzin deng mthong bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-8: byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po phyag g-yas pas bzung ste rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin la yang dag par gtad par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-10: gang 'dod pa de sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:77b-11: de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas pa sgrub pa po'i lag pa g-yas bzung nas rgya mtsho'i dbus su lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-1: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i tshogs la me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-5: rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-6: rdzi rnga rnams sgra 'byin bzhin du gru 'dzin du 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-7: rgya mtsho'i steng der rgya mtsho chen po rig pa'i rgyal pos mthong nas skyes bu dam pa de'ang chu klung thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rin po che'i mchod yon rab tu stsol bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-8: legs so zhes bya ba'ang gnang bar mdzad do; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-11: gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-12: de nas rgya mtsho chen po bsgral nas gru 'dzin du song ste mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-13: der gang rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-20: lto 'phye chen po rnams thams cad mchod yon gyi snod kyi me tog gi char chen pos sgrub pa po la bsu ba la 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-21: de nas gru 'dzin mthong nas sna tshogs pa'i nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78a-23: mu tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-0: bee @78b d'urya las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-1: aindra n'i la las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-2: mthon ka chen po las byung ba'i them skas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-3: snam bu rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i me tog nye bar mdzes pas rig pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-4: sgrub pa po de la mngon par dbang bskur ba byas nas sgrub pa po la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-5: gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba khang pa dbus mar ji srid byang chub kyi bar du rang gi gnas bzhin du kun tu spyod cing gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-6: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la mngon par dbang bskur te rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu bgrod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-7: 'di ni dngos grub ste bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mthu rnam par bsgyings pas mtshams med pa byed pas kyang 'di 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-8: rta mgrin rgyal pos rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba dbus ma'i khang bar rang gi gnas bzhin du gzhi la gnas pa'i rig pa sgrol ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-12: gzhan rig pa thams cad pha rol gnon pa chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:78b-13: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni ma bsgrubs pa nyid du las byed de gtan pa gcod par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-0: h'um yig gis rgya mtsho skems @79a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-2: sor mo'i sdigs mdzub kyis thams cad rengs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-3: aom yig gis 'gugs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-4: phat yig gis lhun po rnams kyang rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-5: yid kyi bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-6: aom yig gis spyan drangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-7: h'um yig gis gshegs su gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-8: phat yig gis gsod pa dang /
