K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-9: sv'ah'a'i yi ges 'tsho bar byed pa ste mdor na rig pa rnams kyi cho ga ji snyed yod pa de thams cad rig pa 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten dang; 'jig rten las 'das pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-10: 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong ba ste gang la cho ga med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-11: sdig pa byed pas kyang lan gsum du bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-12: rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su gnang ba stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-13: pha rol gnon pa chen po 'di lan gsum gyis mtshams med pa byed pas kyang 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-14: dad pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung ba 'dod pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-19: chos la mngon par dang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79a-24: myur ba kho nar bzod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-0: sbyin pa sbyin @79b par byed pa ma bsgrub par 'grub par yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-1: mdor na las thams cad pa ni brjod nas rig gcod par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-2: sel bar 'dod bas 'di brjod nas te 'di ni las thams cad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-3: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gzhan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-4: rig pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa'i ched du rta mgrin rgyal po'i mgul du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu rnam par bsgyings ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-6: de nas 'od dpag med mthong bar 'dod na kha tshar ma bcad cing skra dang bral ba'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser ltar ser ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-7: padma la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-8: 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs g-yon du rta mgrin rgyal po zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-11: padma la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-12: me dmar ser 'bar ba 'phro bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-13: rin po che'i phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:79b-16: sor mos log par 'dren pa la sdigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-1: log par 'dren pa 'bros par byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-2: g-yas kyi gzhogs su rnam par brgyan pa spyangs pa'i snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-4: phyag g-yas pa sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-5: ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus su 'od dpag med mgo bos 'dzin par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-7: 'od dpag med kyi steng gi sprin de la sprin gseb nas gnas gtsang ma me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi padma de'ang klu gzhon nu rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-9: 'og tu lag na spos phor thogs pa'i sgrub pa po bus mo gnyis btsugs pa 'od dpag med la rnam par lta bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-10: ri mo'i las yongs su rdzogs pa dang sgrub pa pos gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-12: mchod pa rgya chen po byas te zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas spyangs pa'i snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-13: gos 'di nyid kyis rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin bkug nas mchod yon phul te sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-14: slar yang gshegs su gsol te ba ser skya'i mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80a-16: n'a ga ge sar rnams gcig tu byas nas nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-0: de nas @80b rig pa 'dzin pas lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas smon lam gdab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-1: ji srid du sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-2: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-3: sprin las gu lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-4: me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-5: tsandan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-6: dril bu'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-7: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par bzlas par bya ste ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pa rta mgrin rig pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa sa la 'ong ba de srid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-8: de nas sgrub pa pos me tog dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-9: dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba'i snod kyis mchod yon phul nas smon lam gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pa'i ched du slar yang legs par 'ongs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-13: rta mgrin 'di ni brtson 'grus chen po stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-14: pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:80b-15: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lan gsum bskor ba byas te pus mo btsugs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-0: khyod la snang bar gyur pa gang yin pa @81a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g-yas pa sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nyug par mdzad de 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-5: pha rol gnon pa khyod kyis gang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pas rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrubs pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-7: khyed cag gis mngon par 'dod pa smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-9: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-11: bde ba can du 'gro bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od dpag med de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste sgrub pa po phyag g-yas pas bzung nas rta mgrin rgyal po la yang dag par gtad par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-16: rig pa'i rgyal po chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81a-17: skyes bu dam pa 'di bzung nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-0: gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa der bstod du bcug nas slar yang gru 'dzin gang na @81b yod pa der shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-1: de nas rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bzung nas me tog gi char 'bebs pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston de la ltos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-6: de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos der bstod du bcug nas slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gru 'dzin pa der 'ong bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-7: de nas sgrub pa po 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi drung du chos nyan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-8: dngos grub 'di ni gnas ma yin pa rnams la gang sbyar bar mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-9: gang zhig byed na dam tshig las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod nas mchog gi sgrub pa rnams la 'di gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu mi sbyor te de'i dam tshig med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-10: las de rnams thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-11: thal bas thal ba'i rva ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-12: sgron me gsum gyis me'i rva ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-13: chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas nam mkha'i bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-14: yungs kar dkar pos sa gzhi bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-15: til gyi sbyin sreg gis log par 'dren pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-16: ske tshe'i sbyin sreg gis yi dvags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:81b-17: sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-1: ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis khro bo thams cad 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-2: me tog thams cad tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg gis 'jig rten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-3: dhu dhu'i sbyin sreg gis dbang phyug chen po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-4: pri yang ku'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-7: gu gul ba ser skya'i mar dang lhan cig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byed na rig pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-15: rkang bzhi pa thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-16: gi wang la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas thig le byas te mche bas tha dad par za bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-17: tha snyad las rgyal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-18: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas ba ser skya'i mar blangs nas lus la mngon par byugs te mer rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-19: seng ldeng las byung ba'i rdo rje blangs te h'um yig dang lhan cig pas phug gi sgor lha ma yin gyi bu mo byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-20: rab tu zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82a-21: gal te 'khor lo rab tu 'jug par byed na dam tshig dran pas h'um yig gi phung pos 'khor lo phye mar byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-0: de nas ril bu'i sgrub pa 'byung ste rig pa 'dzin pa ril @82b bu sgrub par byed pas tsandan dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-3: 'bras s'a lu dmar po'i phub ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-10: tu rushka'i til mar rnams gcig tu byas te cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba ser skya'i 'o ma la gso sbyong can gyis ser skya de la rnam par dben par rtsa ba'i sngags su bzlas nas khyim du btags te legs par btsags pa'i chu la mngon par sngags nas nyi ma bdun du spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-12: rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su'ang rung ste de nas srung ba byas pa'i ba lang gi rdzi des ba bzho bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-13: de nas 'o ma de gtsang ma'i phyogs su rnam par dben par bum pa la bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-14: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag srub par byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-15: mar des rdzas rnams btags pa byas te lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkris pa byas nas de'ang ba ser skya'i ba byung lngar ril bur mtshan mo gcig tu bcug nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-16: de nas bton nas dri'i chu las gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-17: bkrus te padma'i 'dab mar gi wang gis byugs la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:82b-18: de nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-1: ga rgya chen po byas te de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa gnyis kas padma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi ril bu brgyad blangs te padma kha sbyor du bzhag nas ba ser skya'i mar de nyid m'a la ti'i me tog dang gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-2: de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drang ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid du ba 'thul bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-3: 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-4: du ba 'thul bzhin pas mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-6: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-7: nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa'i 'od kyis rig pa 'dzin pa mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-9: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-10: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-11: skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-12: 'di nyid kyis padma'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-13: pand'i ta ka ra'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83a-15: aa ga ru nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-0: gi wang rnams pa ser skya'i ba byung rnams gzhon @83b nu ma gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pas btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-1: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas pri yang ku'i shing blangs nas khang pa brtsegs pa gtsang mar shing bzo ba gso sbyong can byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'i lag pas za ma tog byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-2: za ma tog der ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bcug nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma'ang phul nas za ma tog blangs te gos gtsang ma g-yogs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa rig pa'i lha rnams spyan drang bar byas nas ji srid du dro bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-3: du ba 'thul bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-4: 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-5: dro bzhin pa la dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-7: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu'i mchog gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-8: 'bar bar byed pa ni rig pa 'dzin pa drug dang lhan cig 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lhun po'i rtse mor rtse bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-10: dga' ma gur yongs su spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-11: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-12: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-13: skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:83b-14: 'di nyid kyis mig sman ldong ros sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-1: po'i bco lnga la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i gi wang blangs nas mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas nyi ma gung la bram ze'i bu mo gso sbyong can gyis padma'i 'dab mas ba ser skya'i 'o mas btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-2: ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas rang gi lha rnams spyan drangs par byas te mchod yon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-3: gdan phul nas pri yang ku'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-4: ba ser skya'i 'o mas sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-5: lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas slar yang lha de rnams mdun du padma kha sbyor du ril bu bcug nas ji srid du du ba 'thul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-7: 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-8: dro bzhin pa la ni thig le byas pa'i skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-9: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-10: rab tu 'bar bas thig le byas nas rig pa 'dzin pa drug gis yongs su bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-11: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-12: skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84a-13: til gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-2: m'a la ti'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byed na lha mo chus byung dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-3: pri yang ku'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-5: soo gandhi ka'i sbyin sreg byed na gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-6: yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas gang gi spyi bor byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-9: srin pos zin pa'i mdun du skye tshe la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas sbyin sreg byed cing de'i thal bas snun par byed na grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-10: rta mgrin rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'ang rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu bsgyings pa 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad du 'gyur ba de 'byung ste rig pa'i rgyal po gang la cho ga med pa de rnams cho ga 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-13: rtog pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyis thams cad byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-15: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang lan gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-17: gang dad pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:84b-21: rig pa'i rgyal po la gus pa'i gang rtog pa pa la mchod par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-2: gzhan la ston par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-3: ser sna med par gyur nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-7: dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-8: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar rta mgrin rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-9: slar yang dus de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi cha nas mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgrol ma mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-10: bgrang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs kyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gsang sngags thob pa gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa bzhugs pa gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di nyid du 'ongs nas ji ltar byung ba'i padma'i gdan la gnas pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'phel ba'i stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85a-11: sgrub pas padma'i gdan de la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-0: de lta bu la sogs pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul @85b phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-1: de nas mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud phyi ma 'dir bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sngags kyi spyod pa la so sor rjes su yi rang ba'i ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-5: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-6: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dngos grub kyi ched du bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrubs pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-13: kam ka ni kam ka ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-14: ro tsa ni ro tsa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-15: tro ta ni tro ta ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-16: tr'a sa ni tr'a sa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-17: pra ti ha na pra ti ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-18: sarba karma pa ram pa r'a ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-32: dharma aa dhishthi te ki li ki li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-33: sam gha aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:85b-35: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-0: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa bskal @86a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-1: par brjod de yid la byed par 'gyur ba de bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-3: byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-10: pushpe pushpe pushpe pushpe pushpe pushpe pushpe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-11: gzungs 'di me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te cho ga ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-12: 'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-13: de'i mngon par 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-14: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-16: na ma:sarba ni ba ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-17: bishkvam bhi ne ta th'a ga t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-28: ba ru na sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-29: ye lo ka sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-30: b'i ra na sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-31: sa tya sa tsa ne na sphu tantu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-32: sarba p'a p'a ni sarba buddha aa dhishthi ne na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-33: mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis las thams cad zad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-35: mtshan mo gsum byas nas drug tu rab tu sbyor bas mtshams med pa nges par zad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-36: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86a-37: na mo bee ro tsa n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-0: @86b na ma a'a k'a sha garbh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-3: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-9: a'a gatstsha a'arya a'a k'a sha garbha mah'a k'a ru ni ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-13: buddha bi sha yam ra tsa ra tsa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-15: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags pa 'grub pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-22: chom rkun la sogs pa rnams gnon par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-23: gang du bris pa gnas pa'am mgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-24: lag pas bcang bar byed pa de la nye bar 'tshe ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-25: nad 'go ba thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-26: 'di rtag tu bzlas pas dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-27: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-28: na mo be ro tsa n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-30: na ma a'a k'a sha garbha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-33: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-37: sh'u n+ya t'a pra de she /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-38: bee ro tsa na garbhe sanytsa aindra ya sho dha ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-39: cho ga ni rtag tu bzlas pas 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-41: phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:86b-44: log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-1: nas lag tu bcang bar byed pa de'ang yon tan 'di rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-3: na ma:sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-7: sho dha ne sho dha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-8: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha na shuddhe bi shuddhe sarba karma aa ba ra ni bi shuddhe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-9: gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te rtag tu bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-10: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pas skye ba bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-11: ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zad par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-13: na mo bha ga wa ti a'arya pradzny'a pa ra mi t'a ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-17: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87a-18: 'di'i cho ga ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs nas de'i mdun du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gnas der mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ba'i mar gyis mar me phul te bya ba yid la dran par gyur pas gdon par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-0: de nyid du ku sha bting nas gser gyi kha dog gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i @87b sku mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-1: de 'di la yang dag par lta ba bzhin ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-3: mtshan mo nyid du'ang rung ste tshig tu gdon par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-4: sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-6: na mo a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-9: mah'a k'a ru ni ka ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-11: dza ye dza ye mah'a dza ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-19: sarba karmma a'a ba ra n'a ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-24: sarba bud dha aa ba lo ki te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-33: pra su ra pra su ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-37: aa bh'a ba; sarba dharma aa bi bhe da ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-38: gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te mtshan mo gcig tu dran par byas nas rtag tu bzlas pas bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa'ang zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-39: sangs rgyas stong gis nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-40: bskal pa stong gi 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-41: skye ba rdjes te lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:87b-43: yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-0: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ji ltar 'dod @88a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-1: pa'i rmi lam mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-2: 'di ni stong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te phan yon chen po byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo bklag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-8: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-9: bo dhi satv'a ya; ma h'a satv'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-12: dha da sha bhu dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-15: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-19: dharma satva ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-20: sam satya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-29: hi ri mi ri ti ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-30: ni ni; ma ma sa pa ri b'a ra sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-33: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis gzungs 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88a-34: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rig pa'i gzungs 'di ni bklags pas 'grub pa; ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams 'byung ba ste zla ba nya la gso sbyong can gyis nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas kyang rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-0: spyan ras gzigs dbang @88b phyug gi spyan sngar byang chub kyi shing gi me rab tu sbar nas til nag po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-1: de bzhin du nyi ma bdun du lan re'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-2: thun gsum du byas na rgyal po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-3: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-4: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-6: zla bar yul gyi don du grog mkhar bdun gyi rtse mo song nas re re 'dzegs te nyi ma snga dro nas ji srid phyi dro'i bar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-7: mtshams med pa grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-8: bu 'dod na 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-9: mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khye'u 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-10: gzungs 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-11: gnod pas gdon 'bros par byed pa la byabs pas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-12: rdzas su bcings pas kyang rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-13: yang na chom rkun thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-14: rtag par rgyun du zlos bzhin pa ni nor nye bar bsags par 'gyur zhing dgra rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:88b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis slar yang la pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-4: sarba ni ro ga:bi na sha ni tstsha da ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-6: b'a ta sa mutthi tam ba ta sa mu tishtha tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-8: sanni p'a ta sa mutthi tam sarba n'a sha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-9: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-12: gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas nas mi snang bar gyur nas lag pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-13: ku sha la brgyad brgyar yongs su sngags nas mig la byab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-14: long bas kyang mig so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-15: zla ba drug gis rtag tu dran par byed na mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-17: gru 'dzin na gnas pa'i 'khor chen po la legs par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-19: grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di ni rtog pa'i rgyal pos rgyud phyi ma 'dir brjod pa sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos rtag tu dge slong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-22: dge bsnyen ma chos gos kyi rna ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89a-23: gos kyi mtha' la mdud pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-0: gang la @89b la zhig bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub par byed pa des lan gcig brjod nas gsum gyi gos la bgos pas dgra dbang du nye bar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-1: gdug pa thams cad rengs par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-2: dngos grub thams cad rtogs par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-3: don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-4: rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-5: mi mdza' ba rnam par 'joms par 'dod pa de ci'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can don thams cad bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-7: de la yid la grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-9: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-13: na ma aarya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-16: na ma a'arya mah'a sth'a ma prapt'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-18: ba m'a ne tranna ma sy'a mit'anna ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-20: pi sh'a tsi parna sha wa ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:89b-35: y'e ke tsi ta; au pa dra bi ki /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-5: aa dhishtha teermantra pa reerma ma rakshi ku ru pa ri tra nam ku ru pa ri gra ham ku ru pa ri gra ham ku ru pa ri p'a lan ku ru svasti ya nam ku ru dandi pa ri ha ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-6: ku ru bi sha pa ri ha ram ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-7: bi shdbu sha nam ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-8: bi sha na sha nam ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-10: aa mri te aa sva targe ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-11: ma ra ma ra sa ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-16: mam sarba satv'a n'anytsa raksham ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-17: 'di ni ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-18: sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-20: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-22: mi rnams la yams kyis nye bar 'tshe ba la shing sha ma'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas gang ba'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad thun gsum du ji ltar nus pas sbyin sreg phyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-23: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas ri khrod lo ma can la'ang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-24: de bzhin las byas pas nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-25: ba lang gi nye bar 'tshe ba la ba lang gi spu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-26: rus pas sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-27: ma he'i nad thams cad la skra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90a-28: rus pas nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-0: rgyu skar gyi @90b gnod pa la nyi ma bdun du 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-1: dngos grub thams cad rtog par 'dod pas nyi ma bdun du nye bar 'tshe ba la seng ldeng gi phye ma'i sbyin sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-2: mgo bo na ba la dri bzang po'i me tog la yongs su bzlas nas bsnams nas mer gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-4: rims la srad bu bcing bar bya ste rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-7: gdon la bag zan las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te nyi ma bdun nas grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-8: mig na ba la mig sman gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-9: nyi ma bdun gyis grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-10: zhi bar 'dod pas d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-12: rgyas par 'dod pas yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-14: rgyal ba la shu dag gi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-16: lan tshva las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sbyin sreg gyis shig ;dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-17: sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa la yal 'dab kyi las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-18: sbrul las byung ba'i nyi ma bdun la dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-20: sha za'i rgyas btab pa la lan nyi shur bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par byas te rang gi gnas su 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:90b-21: rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-1: 'jug pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdong la yongs su bzlas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-2: sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-3: mdor na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-4: sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gi sa las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-5: las thams cad la dang por gang ba'i sreg blugs sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-6: las thams cad la'ang las 'di nyid kyis shig ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-7: gso sbyong can gyis bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-8: sems dpa' thams cad la sems kyis dmigs pas sa las byung ba'i ka p'a la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-9: sella ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas gzhon nu mas mdud pa brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-10: de nas de dri'i chus bkrus nas shing la bzhag ste de yi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-11: de bzhin du ma he rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-13: phyugs rnams la chom rkun gyis nye bar 'tshe ba la rva la bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-14: bum pa chus gang ba byas nas gtsang mas brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pa byas te nad pa'i sked pa la bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-16: khyim du tshangs pa'i srin po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91a-17: sha zas nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-0: ji ltar nus pa'i gtor ma bya'o zhes te 'di ni ri khrod @91b lo ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo sde'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-1: slar yang dus de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor phyag g-yas pa rab tu brkyang nas nyug par mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-3: rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de 'di klog par byed pas 'grub par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-4: rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po phyi ma de la bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-7: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa po'i dngos grub byed pa rtag tu byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-8: blo gros dang ldan pas gang dge ba'i tshes grangs la bris nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas sngags kyi tshig rnams bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-14: samyaksam buddha ko t'i n'am n'a mo mee tree ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-16: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-18: na ma: samyakpra ti panna n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-20: na mo n'a g'a m'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:91b-21: na mo: sa kri d'a gi m'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-4: aa pa ra dzi ta hri da yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-5: m'a barta yishya mi samyaksam buddha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-8: de ba ga dee sarbba karma ka ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-16: de banytsa aa pa ra dzi t'a hri da yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-17: m'a ba rta mi sarba p'a pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-21: sarba gra ha bi n'a sha n'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-23: ka ri hye sha shakra syee ba aa ba ra dzi t'a pa sha kri tya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-26: aagni ri pu n'a sha n'i kri tya karma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-28: svapna pi aa tha sputa na de ba d'a na ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-33: raksham/ kurbantu me ni tyam sa m'anta tsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-34: te dza nam ae hi k'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-35: dri t'i ya ga dzva r'a tri t'i yaksha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-36: tsa turtha ke bhyo raksha yam ba shim ma dzva ra karma ni bi sha bhuktam ga ram tsee ba bhyo dzya bardza yi shya ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-37: ya sya b'a na bha ba ta garbho ha yante ya sya d'a ka ra ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-38: ratna m'a la ai yam te sh'am kshi pra ma ma ba ha te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-41: shr'i k'a mo la bha te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-51: t'a ba t'a lo ka n'a tha hri drishta satva nu pa dru tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-53: aom dha na ka ri bi pu la ka ri ya sha ka ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-54: biddha ka ri aa yunta ti aa la kshi pra sa ma ni dham narb'an+ya bin+ya bardha ni ba shri ka ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92a-55: sarba gra ha naksha tra pa sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-0: su @92b tra dza na ni pa ri b'a ra badhya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-5: aa mo ha shakti k'anytsa na m'a la gra h'a soo mya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-6: ka ra ni sarba k'a li k'a l'a h'a bi gra ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-7: bi b'a da pra sha mi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-9: ni b'a ra ni pa ra ma see n+ya stam bh'a ni tsitta nirma l'i ka ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-10: sarba p'a pra sha ma ni sarba kilbi sha n'a sha ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-14: sarba de ba aa nu dzny'a te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-15: sarba n'a ga sam rakshi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-20: ye sh'am pi dhva shanti bi sha ma tsitt'a yanti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-22: k'a khorda kurbanti ka ra yanti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-23: kritanytsa aa bha y'a nu mo de ne rtha ba phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-24: aagni stambha y'a mi bi sham shasta au da ka tsoo ri sarba dusht'a sarba by'a dhi ta tsan tram dza na y'a mi h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-25: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'dab mas khrus byas te rin po che'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa las thams cad byed pa 'di ni rtag tu srung ba byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-26: de bzhin nyid du'ang gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-28: der yang rung ste la la'i bgegs srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-34: thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:92b-35: gang 'di 'dzin pa la rig pa zhi ba bris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-0: skyes pas rtag tu klog pa de la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur @93a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-2: 'dzin pa thams cad rtag tu srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-3: gsang ba rnams kyis yongs su skyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-4: cho ga'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu mthar byed pa ni ji ltar rin po ches spras pa'i phreng ba steng du rnam par 'bar ba'i dpal gang yin pa de rig pa 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-5: 'di las gdon de rnam par nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-7: bu tsha bo rnams kyang 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-8: 'khor bzang po can rnam par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-9: rig pa 'di ni thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-10: byis pa rnams khyad par du bsrung bar bya ba'i ched do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-14: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas gzigs par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-15: dge ba'i don rnam par 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-16: sdig pa thams cad kun nas zad par 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-17: rmi lam ngan pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-18: nyes par byas pa rnams las kyang grol te 'dir the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93a-19: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i gzungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-0: de nas 'di las rgyud 'dir byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i @93b mtshan nyid gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-6: nye ba'i snying po dang zhes pa ste rnam pa lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-7: rtsa ba'i rig pa la ni drug cur bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-8: don thams cad sgrub pa de la dang por re zhig ra bi ta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-10: sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-11: mthe chung khab kyi rnam pas nges par btsir ba'i gung mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-12: mthe bong dag tu bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-13: 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gang ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes rnam par grags te don thams cad sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-14: rig pa tshim par byed pa la mthe chung gnyis bsnun par bya ste rnam par tshim par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-15: lhag par gnas pa ni mthe bong gnyis ka khab kyi rnam pas so sor g-yo bar bya ste snying po rnam par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-16: bstod pa kho na'i ming gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-17: nye ba'i snying po la mthe bong gnyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-19: nang kho na'i khu tshur ro; ;mthe chung lcags sgrog gi cha'i sgra'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-20: sdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab tu byas pa 'di ni go cha'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:93b-21: rtag tu bdag nyid la rab tu sbyar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-0: sdigs mdzub gnyis nges par btsir nas gung mo dkris te khab kyi rnam pas bsdigs pa 'di ni gtsug phud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ste bdag nyid kyi gtsug phud bcings pa'i @94a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-1: dus su rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-2: slar yang khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab kyi rnam pa ste 'di ni bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-3: de lta bu kho na yongs su gyur pas sdigs mdzub khab kyi rnam pas ra ba'i phyag rgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-4: khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa ste mtshan ma 'di ni dam tshig srung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-5: rkang pa bsnyams pa la g-yas pa'i rkang pa rab tu bzhag nas gar gyi sbyor bas yongs su bskor bar bya ste gzhan du bskor nas lag pa gnyis kas rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i las sbyar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-6: dpral bar yang las thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-7: de nas phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-10: rnam pa gzhan du'ang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-12: las thams cad la rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-13: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du phyag rgya bcings pa gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94a-14: de la 'di rnams yang dag sbyar bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-0: @94b yams ni bde bar bya dang mkhas pa phyag 'tshal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-1: rig gsum la yang thun mong phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-2: de rnams nye bar drangs pa phyag 'tshal phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-3: g-yas pa'i sor mo'i tshigs la tshigs kyis rtse mo kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-4: phyag rgya nyid ni rjes su bcing bar gyis shig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-5: rtag tu gsol ba 'debs la gtsang ma gsol 'debs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-6: phyag rgya de bzhin kho nar g-yas pa sor mo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-7: tshigs rnams tshigs su byas nas rjes su yi rang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-8: mchod pa thams cad kho na gtsang mas rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-9: mchod pa rtag tu rjes su yi rang byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-10: sor mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-11: tshigs kyi rtse mo mthe bong snying por yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-12: 'di rnams rgyal ba yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-13: sor mo'i rtse mo yang dag sbyar ba gung mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-14: mthe bong gnyis kar gang du mi 'gyur phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-15: bzlas pas mchog sbyin yid kyis bzlas pas phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-16: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ston par mdzad bzhin pas slar bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-17: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:94b-18: nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-1: ldan pa'i sa 'di rang 'gul bas skrag cing me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-2: bar snang las spyod pa'i 'byung po bye bas thams cad du 'gro ba'i gdug pa rab tu btul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-3: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la yongs su zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-5: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-8: des na ral pa gyen brdzes zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-9: rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-12: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-13: rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i le'u rab 'byams zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-14: thabs kyi spyod pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam gyis de rnams yang dag par ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-18: chos du zhig gis lhag par gnas pa lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95a-20: des gang chos bcus 'di lta bu mthong ba kho na ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-0: @95b byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-8: yi dvags la sogs pa rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-9: gzungs mnyam pa'i sems zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-10: dge ba'i chos las kun tu gnas pa'i sa ji srid du 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-12: glegs bam du 'gyur ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-16: bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-18: phan yon mang po nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-19: phan yon chen po nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-20: lha dang bcas pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-22: sngags chen po 'dus pa 'khor ba'i pha rol tu song ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-23: bdag gis kyang yang dag par rgyu skar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-27: lor bde ba'i ched du mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-28: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-29: grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-30: ral pa gyen brdzes 'chang ba po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:95b-32: rab tu byung ba rnams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-2: bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-5: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-7: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-8: 'di ni jo bo chen po aa ti sha'i phyag dpe rva sgreng nas dka' thub chen pos gdan drangs nas sh'akya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis 'phar ba'i lo cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni lotstsha ba chen po 'di nyid kyi zhabs drung du nye bar gnas pa sh'akya'i dge slong bsod nams grub kyis bgyis so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-9: pandi ta la ma gtugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-10: dpe dpang 'grel pa ma rnyed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-11: sgra don log par gyur srid na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-001:96a-12: mkhas pa rnams kyis bcos par gsol ////
